Dear Blogger...... my top is golden my vision is blue my smile is 400+ my chest is ocean blue my touch is flirty pink my rest is honey brown Why do you ignore the passion that lays beside you, why must you see what you choose to be unable.The light behind you is getting dim and my eyes are failing. Do you reach for me, or allow your body to flow where the source is drawn.I no longer can see you, but i can feel your breath on my body. Not knowing where you are and the thought of you brings chills to my very being. My skin is now bare and my eyelashes rest upon my cheeks. Do you need me as a whole, or do you just feel the need? Flirty pink in two places you would think that i have adapted to the neatness. Can you feel my softness, as you seem to judge me in the dark. I am who i am, strong as you thought. Do not test the taste of pureness, you may want seconds.

Today the rain pours down on us starting last night. It will stay until the middle of next week as far as i can tell. I still have no computer at my house, and i am reminded when i have a good idea and want to get on and i cant. In due time i tell my self. Im trying to teach myself a bit of pateince, lets see if it works... Last night i was stubborn as hell and J and i got into a tiff. I will admit that i was stubborn, but then just got plain pissed off. He told me to "shut-up" and thats all i have to say. Dont really feel like talking much about it, im passed it and that is what matters most. Didnt eat and didnt eat much for lunch today, just some peanuts. He is very quiet today, but i understand that he is not feeling too good, so im letting it ride. Sometimes i seem to take things too seriously, im trying to work on that. Im trying not to let things bother me as much as i do, sometimes i just cant help it. Like J got some neighbors next door, well they park in his driveway and block his driveway when their friends are over. And at first they didnt ask, then mabye they heard me saying something to J about it. But then they asked like they should have. Its like i have no problem with them doing it, exept it was disrespectful to me when they didnt ask first. I would never pull in someones driveway and park without asking. But mabye that is just me. So i say nothing to J about that anymore and i let it ride. Besides it is not my house, so i really dont have any say so..... Sometimes i think that people run over J because he never says anything or puts his foot down. But gets mad at me when i try to help me. Am i turning into my mother? Oh shit, please say that im not. Why does it always seem that i have the same old problems....No wonder no one reads this, i wouldnt either it would get really boring! Ha, crap i should mix it up a tad......I should do something like adventures in MIKA LAND. Ok, so mabye that would be just as bad as the same ole stuff. I would like to sit and relax, watch the rain and listen to the beatles....... That sounds so good to me, mabye grab a good book. But i would like to zone out awhile before i started to read. Right now im sitting at work, and i have a great view. Im watching Jason install a computer on the desk in front of me. Even though he says nothing, his presence is good. And that makes me feel good. I wonder why i feel that way, i wonder if he feels that way about me when i am near. He dosent act like it, so i was wondering if he did feel that way on occasion. Actually i could really care less about it. I do then i dont. No word from Thomas...An E-mail I need to get a hold of my dad Fathers day is just around the corner, and i have yet to call him. Although i dont plan on asking Jason if he wants to go up there. Im sure that he really dosent want to. I mentioned it one time, and he said nothing. Its his car and time, so i figure that if he really wanted to then he will mention it to me. I get tired of my shit being put on him, and all my crap for him to deal with. Not to mention that since i cant afford to get my dental done on my own, he put it on his credit card. He rocks in that sense, but it bothers me to know that i borrowed money from him. I hate that feeling, but i know that i would not have done it inless i couldnt on my own. Im starving and didnt want anything at jasons house, perhaps i should hit the snack bar, nah, im fat enough....

"A bit of fragrance always clings to the hand that gives the rose." - Chinese proverb I love your lips when they're wet with wine And red with a wild desire; I love your eyes when the lovelight lies Lit with a passionate fire. I love your arms when the warm white flesh Touches mine in a fond embrace; I love your hair when the strands enmesh Your kisses against my face. Not for me the cold, calm kiss Of a virgin's bloodless love; Nor for me the saint's white bliss, Nor the heart of a spotless dove. But give me the love that so freely gives And laughs at the whole world's blame, With your body so young and warm in my arms, It sets my poor heart aflame. So kiss me sweet with your warm wet mouth, Still fragrant with ruby wine, And say with a fervor born of the South That your body and soul are mine. Clasp me close in your warm young arms, While the pale stars shine above, And we'll live our whole young lives away In the joys of a living love.

Thomas seems to be moving up in the world with everyone wanting his art. Im proud of him, and he deserves it none the less. There is a new eating joint that wants to have his work in there place. Thats really cool, and i would like to go there and take pictures of it up on their wall. That would be something that i would love to have done. Have my stuff hanging somewhere.....for people to gaze at in awkward conversations. I have not talked to him much recently, he has been so busy getting paintings done on a deadline. Gotta do what you gotta do. Makes me wonder what his mom thinks, i know that she is proud, but i would just like to see her thoughts from time to time. Im just like that though, i like to see what other people are thinking. May not like it though...eesh Jason has been busy at work, installing computers and setting people up here and there. Pretty soon he will be rare when it comes to the every day office hours. He needs to get out in the parks and see the sun light, could be good for him. But might make him really tired when he comes home, cant win for losing sometimes. For someone that has the world by his finger, he sure seems to always have something on his mind. Just stop, breath in and enjoy...Smell the Java.... As for me.....Today i have a dental appt., im not looking forward to it in the least. Its gonna hurt for days after and i hate getting shots into my gums. Ee gads, im gonna have to eat at lunch, im not sure if i will for dinner. I passed up a better job than mine, well its a little better. I didnt put my app. in and i know that i prob. would have gotten the job. It pays better, not a whole lot, but more. I would only be going right down the hall. But i chickend out, i thought i would not have been good enough for the job. Turns out, i would have. Its too late for me to turn in an app. Yes Jason told me to do it and now im catching the heat from him about not trying. I do understand why he could be upset that i didnt try, but damn dont put me down about it. Its my decision, not his. I know now that i made the mistake, so let it go at that. Thank you...drive thru please.... Kens birthday is tomorrow, and i have no idea what to get him. He didnt tell me or give me a clue....so im gonna have to guess on that one. Lunch lunch is all i can think about.....her hungry..... Still loving my computer here at work........My computer at home is gone. My harddrive crashed on me, and i dont know why. Very frustrating and im pissed about it. All my pictures that i ever took since i had my camera were on there. I didnt have a back-up, i couldnt afford one with all my dental that has popped up on me. So there it is, i lost what matters most in my work. Lesson learned, sont attempt without a back-up. Stupid stupid stupid... Fathers day is coming up and i need to figure out what im going to do about that. I want to go see him, but not sure if J is up to it Iowa is coming back..J has to go up there and upgrade his moms computer. So im excited about that. My mom here also says that she wants her, my sister and I to head out to Tunica for the weekend. Take off Friday and come back sunday. A womens retreat. gamble gamble.......we shall see if i have the funds.

Ok, so i have neglected my post, but not for as long as it could have been mind you. I have had no computer at home for 2 days now. I dont know whats wrong i just know that its not working. lol. There is somthing wrong with my motherboard or my Hard drive. Its Jason's work of art, so only the master hands can fix it. So her waits........ I got a badass computer at work, j hooked it up for shelle. Its the new Dell, pretty n black. Flat screen and quite keyboard and all the fixins, quite nice. I have waited long enough for it! Dont bitch michelle, be glad that you have it! Her is happy with what her has.....Jason always says nothings ever good enough for me.....not true...right?.... eh This weekend my mom called and wanted me to tag along with her and the rest of my funny in the head family. I said ok, and so we went to "Toad Suck Park" and had some kind of family eat thing. If that is what you call it. Its not that my family is wierd, ok perhaps. We load up and none of us really speak to each other. Or when they do, they pry into my life, or talk about the other messed up people in the family. I sit around a table and have people come up to me and say: " this is your cousin, and this is, and this is, and this is.....Geez will these people stop having kids for fucks sake! I have no idea who the people are, and they all look like they crawled right out of the closest trailer park. Kinda like that one episode off "punked". Im sitting there and they are all taking foil off the food that they brought. And its like they like to play games with there food (lets see who can figure this dish out). All the dirty faced kids gather around and scream about wanting some food NOW. There little fingers getting into one dish after another. Dropping food all over the ground, and there parents are all sitting together smoking and talking. They only turn around to say something after a peice of chicken hits their leg. Im sitting in the back with my mom watching the show..... Its not that im better than parts of my family, but damn, you would have to be there. This was sunday..... Saterday... J and I met up with Thomas for the arts museum. We went to teh exhibit and it was cool, alot of good stuff was seen and it was a good time. I enjoyed sitting out by the water in the front. The sun was hot and the slight breeze from the water . Leaned back and stuck my hands into the running water and it was cool, and felt very good. Thomas was standing there, and seemed like he wanted to leave, but didnt want to tell us. I asked him about how he felt and he said that is was all good. So thoughts are replaced with good ones. Friday, Saterday and Sunday i went to bed about 3or4 in the morning, its been tuff. I have too much going on in my head and i cant figure a god damn thing out. Must break free! Dental appt. tomorrow, michelle please do not forget.... 50 Bucks if you forget.

Today is Friday and i am happy go lucky to see it come. This week has been a long week and i am ready to do what i want again. Tonight i will be hanging out with Jason and i cant wait to get there. I want to sit on the couch and turn on the fan and just have a good time, relax. I try to not be in his face so much anymore, or follow him around. Not that i did it that bad from the start but im giving up on the "closeness" part of that. The night before last i decided to give Jason a date, and not this friday but the next im moving in with him. I really will miss alot of things from where i am at now, but i want this bad enough to just go for it. That means that i will be getting another job, i also need to try and find some time to work in Jason's yard. I have to get some things done on Sabina, and i need a second job to pay for it. Things i need to a second job for: A CAR Getting things done on Sabina buying nifty things for the house Paying bills education Jason is still having problems with my computer and he dosent know what it is. He thinks that im not every happy with what he does, WRONG, i know how hard he has worked and all the time that he has spent on it. And i thank you Jason! At least we have one working computer again! Thomas asked me how i was going to be able to work 2 jobs and do Photoshop, i told him that i didnt know, but i was going to have to. I never thought about it like that until he asked me. But i will just have to buck up and do it. I cant get what i want where i am now, so its time for a change. I will have to work my ass off, but i want a DAMN HONDA! Everyone says, I cant be picky, i may have to get something else first. NOPE, i want what i want and i will work my ass off to get it. Although i will be tired as hell. Cookie dough, blind date, and a fan with someone beside me playing with my hair! That is what i want! I hope that Thomas has a good weekend, he left and didnt say much from messenger!

There is so much heat for the ones we love, its you and me, you wont be unhappy. Keep running up that road, keep running up that hill. Come on baby, come on darlin, let me steal this moment from you now, lets exchange the experience. sigh>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Bicker Bicker Bicker is all i seem to be good at now a days, and evern then sometimes i fail. I think that Jason has to many things that he does not like about me. He complains and gripes about the things that i do or dont do. ugh...almost really hard to go on sometimes. But i love him and that is what keeps me going on, and im sure that it is the same thing for him about me. He is tired of waiting and i dont blame him a bit. But when i dont know what i want, im not going to rush into something and then be sorry later. So i have to make sure that everything is thought over thru and thru. If he dosent want to wait until i feel its right, then i dont think i need to move in because he is not respecting my side of it. And then in haste he tells me "well then i think you should just forget about it". And that is where i stand as of right now. Eh, there is so much that i can say right now, but my mind wants to give no effort towards it. I talked to Thomas more than i have recently today, and that kicks ass. He has been a busy little bee, but i like it when he talks to me, so i know what is really going on in his head. I like to hear his stories of his past, and i listen close. I learn from him, and he takes me into imaginary places that i dream up in my head. I have been very busy at work, and i hate that i cant just talk talk talk, but i wanna. I like to hear about the places that he has visited, because ive never been there. So i sit back and think about what it might be like. His experiences are pure and good to hear. He listens too, and asks questions like he really cares......Ah breath, thomas Sam has really moved up his game, and he is supa sweet... Stacey has been supa sweet..... and that is a change.... Stacey found my smut book, and he looked like "why not me"..... IN MY PURSE I MIGHT ADD JABA the Kelley cuts my ciggs in half, bitch slap coming for her. And Jason buys all kinds of stuff for my new computer, he is so sweet, but gets irritated with me to damn much. I couldnt even stay in there and watch him put it together. bah I miss sabina.....

Im only happy when it rains....... All i can say is that my life is pretty plain, but i like watching the puddles gather rain..... The rain beat loudly on the roof as i slightly opened my eyes to see what time it was. It was 5:27 in the morning and the lightning danced off the curtains and onto the walls. Mika was curled up close to me with her little eyes closed and quick little movements in her paws. She was dreaming and i dare not wake her, after all its the good dreams that someone or something usually wakes us from. I layed my head back down on the pillow and prayed that i would get some more sleep. When i woke it was still raining and a little morning light showed through the window. I thought to myself that i better get up because i had Jasons car and it was raining. I didnt want to be strapped for time, and i wanted to call him when i got to work, so i can tell him that i made it ok. The roads were worse that i expected, they were nothing but water, and all i could do was cuss about how stupid Arkansas Roads were. They were not made right and are in need of desperate attention! I turned up the music, and listened to Beth Orton as she put some sort of calm back in me. Hummed, and tapped my foot the rest of the way to work. Got to work and i was having some problems with my computer. The default page was not wanting to load all the way, and was getting testy not wanting to work after several reboots. My programs were not wanting to respond and shutting down on me. I went to my dentist appt. and she said that there was a vast improvment on my teeth because i was flossing. I never knew that it was that importnet to floss, 400+ dollers later i realize that it is. So for you who do not floss, you better stop by a store tonight on the way home, and grab some floss! The rain was still bad on the way and back from the dentist, streets were still flooded and people acted like they were daredevils, or complete apricots. ( for those that do not know what i mean by apricot, it's a pussy) I got an E-mail back from Jason, and he is fine but wont be back before 5, so i will go to the house and wait for his return. I will be excited to read some more of my book! I got a new book, and its awesome! Its called: "The Sexual Life Of Catherine M." you should check it out. I have had it for about 2 days now and read every chance i have gotten.I kinda made Jason read some of it to me, i like how he reads, heh. The plants on my desk are doing good, mika is at home sleeping under the recliner, and im at work watching the clock.....Need some J-Bug........ Talked to Thomas, he has some people coming over to check out some of his work today, damn he has been so busy. We dont talk like we used to, but that is how things go. I would like to see him again, and to be around him. Hes very comfy, but can put you in a wierd mood real quick. I need some realease of the times that are current, and have no clue how to get that just yet.

ok, ok, hating jason, but just came across this........ I asked him a question, and this was his response! I actually teared up on this one, shush. So mabye hes not so bad, (ahem)! This is the question: If you had 50 dollars, and you are going to die tomorrow, but you are told to buy 5 things. What would you spend it on? This is the answer he gave: 1 medium pizza hut deep pan pineapple pizza - $12.00; 1 2 liter of mt dew - $2; 2 pm tickets to market street cinema $13.00; 1 bottle of cheap but good wine - $13.00; fancy keychain for shelle to hook keys of the Honda to up to $10. Date with shelle during last night on earth - $priceless.

Lunch did nothing but piss me off! I would like to stick my whole foot up jasons ass. First im irritated, so he wants to know why im acting so wierd, because it has only been a couple of hours since i have had a cigg. Yes some of it is in my head that i cant have a cigg, so i make it harder on myself. But Jason wants to act like such an ass when he tells me things, like hey my name is jason and i DO know everything there is to know. But its finally ready, i put it on a plate and sit down to eat it. My mouth is watering, but figure i really have to use the restroom. So i get up and the pizza slides off the plate right on the floor! Didnt even get a bite, i pick it up and throw it in the trash. I will just do without. Dont talk to Jason the rest of the lunch, i didnt really care too. Got in the car and i decided that i was not going to have a smoke. Jason lights one up and trys to give me the " you dont have to quit cold turkey" speech. And im not, because i know that i cant, i just tried to prove to him that i can do it. Im know that im mad because i am trying to quit smoking, he has to understand that. But im not going to expect him to take any abuse either. And then when we get back to work, we are getting in an elevator and he checks out this chick before the doors closed. I wanted to beat his ass right there in the elevator. What an asshole! Thats ok though, i may not be what he wants, but i can get something else easily! (note to readers) The next posts might be angry posts till the newness of no bimps gets out of my head! thank you, drive thru.

Monday Monday....... This weekend was nice, Friday night i hung out with Jason, and Saturday i had an outdoors day. Saturday i got up hung out with Char, Mike, Jason, Staci, Ken, Chris. We rode four-wheelers and cooked out in honor of Kens birthday. I had a real good time. I spent all day outside and it was a nice change. I went to tan, i figured that my mom bought me 10 tans, so i might as well use them. I had not been there in awhile, so i walk in and they say that the beds are open for me to just go right in. Well i walk into the room, and there are all these colored peices of paper that are taped to the wall by the light-switch and on the doors. They were not there last time i went, so i was curious to see what they said. I was shocked when i read this one " Please do not pee in the trashcans, we do have restrooms". I read that and looked around for the trashcan, that was sick. Then i started thinking, should i tan here? It sounds nasty, but this place has always been real nice and picked up, clean if you will. So i tanned and went on. But i was thinking, why didnt they just take the trashcans out of the room, instead of putting those signs up? People may read those signs and decide that its not very clean, and stop going. I think that they should have just taken it out of the room. But thats my opinion..... Sunday i woke up rather early, its fathers day! I woke up and called Jason and asked him if he wanted to hang out. He seemed non intrested and not very excited to hear from me. I guess i expected a tad more seeing how i didnt see him yesterday and never called. I was going to call, but figured that he would just think that i couldnt go a day without him. I even did the whole phone in hand, his number halfway dialed deal. Anways he was acting strange, so i said, "well mabye we shouldnt hang out today" he said "ok" and hung up. SO no, im not going to call him after that. He was rude and i would rather stay at home by myself then to hang with that. Ken had gone to play golf and i was left at home with no car. There was no food in the house and i was almost out of ciggs. I called my mom, keep in mind that i hardly ever call my mom to do me any favors. But i called and asked if she would come pick me up and take me to the gas station. She said that she would after she was done eating, i told her that it was fine. About 10 min after i hung up with her, the phone rings, and its Jason. Keep in mind that this was like 3 or 4 hours after he hung up on me, but for him thats good. Im surprised that he called back period! He said that he was sorry and that he was not awake yet, although i dont really get that. Even if im not awake, i would still get excited that i can hear someones voice that missed. Perhaps that is why im a women, and all fucked up. Or perhaps that is why he is a man, and cant deal with emotions very well. That age old question "why do men and women think so diffrently?" Anyways he ended up picking me up and i was hungry so we went to Wendys and i munched on a salad. I really wanted something else besides a salad, but Jason was like "do you want something healthy, or something not healthy". Sigh, that means that i have to get the damn salad, or the whole time i eat, i will feel like a fat ass. He makes me feel like that, he does. So i munched on the lettuce while he ate what i really wanted to eat. Oh well, easy to forget. Then we went to the Home Depot and then went back to the house to chill. We watched some TV and i read a little William Gibson. Then we decided that we wanted to go and watch a movie, by this time we were hungry again. So we went and ate at Quiznos, first time there, and i dug it! Im not sure if Jason liked it as much as me, but he wasnt sick over it. He told me that my posters were ready, the cinema called and they have them ready for me. I got a poster of "The Pianist" and "Frida". 20 bucks a pop, kinda high, but i wanted them none the less. Frida, Thomas still has not watched, gerrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr. So we went to the theater and picked up the posters, and ended up watching a film. We watched " The Mighty Wind", it was good. I think that "Best in Show" was better, but this was still good. Before we went to the movies we ended up going to Barnes. Telling myself as Jasons finding a parking spot, that im NOT going to buy anything, that money will be getting low soon. We went in and Jason pointed out a book to me that was laid out on the table. It was a book that i can remember he mentioning to me, and pointing out months ago. Come to think of it, he never bought it. I asked him why, he said that it was too much at the time and he couldnt get it. But now it was like 11 bucks, so i snatched it up. I started to read a little of it in one of the comfy chairs in the middle of isles. The guy across from me, looking up from his book often to take a peek. I let him, not bothering him back, but soon just got full fed up. I went to find J and tell him that i was going to check out. I was thinking of getting coffee because i always do, i love it, but didnt. I had the money on the mind. The book had me tuned in fully, and i couldnt put it down. I stepped outside to read and smoke. BTW- the book is "The Sexual Life of Catherine M." very good, erotic, and fun. I love the detail that she goes into about everything, and i cant keep my hands(oops) eyes off it. When i got home, that was all i did, i read, and read till my eyes got sandbag heavy. Today i am starting to wing myself off ciggs, i am cutting down off my breaks and trying to not think about it at all, and yeah, its hard. Im chewing on gum sucking on this and that, and getting edgy. I hate to be Jason in this time of irritation. Mabye i wont be so bad. Oh yeah, "The Real World" is in PARIS! I am having so much fun watching it because i get to see the sites of Paris, in its today fashion.This is a good thing for me, and im happy! Mika says hi, as she waves her paw........ I need a bimp...shit! Have heard little from Thomas, he needs to get sleep.

Well, as you can see i am back to blogging at night again......I have not moved in yet, but i am still here tonight, until he takes me home. I just got through cleaning and sort of setting up my room. It looks good and im back to be excited, then depressed. Although im not going to say it will not come back. But for now, i have a smile on my face. When i came over here today after work, i found a package in the mail from Thomas! YOU ARE SO SNEAKY! I loved it. I listened to it and layed on the floor and just zoned out, it was awesome. You need to write me a playlist, because i want to know who these people are! I reconized some but there are some that i draw a blank. I was in Total Groove through out this CD. Thomas rocks when it comes to his choice of music. I played the cd twice back to back. Then jason wanted to watch the basketball draft, so i was nice enough to stop groovin! The other day Thomas had jenny bring me a carmel latte at work. I cant even think about how cool that was. I was so surprised and it was awesome to see her again. He is as sneaky as me.......I have to start making him some cds because there is alot that i want him to hear! My new case is up and running, and oh my wonderful! Thanks J-Bug! It has a clear side so i can see everything on the inside as it runs. Im going to get some purple neon lights to go inside. It will be a Shelle night light. This is so wierd to have Jason right down the hall. A geek to be disposal! I need to get a shirt that says.....I love my geek! Jasons dad called tonight and said that he would fly Jason and i to colorado for a week! And put us in our own little apartments. I am worried about flying, i love to fly...But have not flown since Sept 11. But im going to buck it up and go!!!! Im excited...a whole week in colorado and fly there for free! Oh yeah, a nice break! Im trying to get on the phone and call my mom, to tell her about the news! Anyways my computer over here is back up and running....good to know for those that want to know! :>)

Wow, the new blogger is quite awesome, they did a little tweaking and came up with something to smile about. The only complaint that i have is that the "new post" page does not load all the way down by the calender. Not even a refresh will do. But something that is alot nicer and i had to work none in the process, i would say that is mighty ok. Besides it might next time... I know that i have been slacking off in the blog portion of my life, but Thomas keeps on about it, so i always seem to come back. I have pretty much done most of my packing, and im ready for it to be over with. Its a sad situation but something good is sure to come of it. I need to get a Uhaul truck asap or Saturday, when i want to move there may not be one there. That is me thinking that everything is at my disposal. But im trying to stay ahead of the game if not on top of it at least. I dont think Mika really knows that we are moving yet, but i guess she will find out soon enough. Last night i was a lazy bum, i did some packing, but i mainly sat on my ass and watched the tube. I read and cleaned up a tad, but i was not full force like i was the day before. I was so thirsty about 10:45 last night and did not want water.(although it is what i need) So Mika and I went to the store. I cant leave her in the car because she barks and goes crazy when i leave her. She is a mammas girl.... So my hair was wet from the shower that took place about 15 min earlier, and i had some PJ bottoms on with a shirt, no bra. I put my purse on one arm, and had Mika on the other. No make-up mind you, so that was bad enough, lol. So Mika and i went into the store to grab some drinks. I paid for them and grabed the bag and walked out. There was a cop coming in as i was going out, and he smiled and said "Is that a palmerainian?" I replyed: "yes". He came over to pet her and started talking to me. He was young, looked about 26 or so, very good looking. I was ashamed, i always told myself not to go out looking like white trash, because you never know who you are going to run in to. So We were chatting, he asked me where i lived and why he had never seen me. And how long he had been on the force and what not. He ended up asking for my number! Wow, i was thinking he wants my number and i look like total crap. I would have understood if he was not so appealing to the eye. But he was very nice looking, built body, blond hair with blue eyes and he had never been married with no kids. I was not giddy or anything, when he was talking i was thinking to myself "i must look like crap, just go'. But i told him that i couldnt give him my number, but it would be nice to see him around some time. And mabye he will let me off for speeding! lol. This morning early is rained, and it rained its little heart out. So today is a dreary day, but kinda nice. Lunch is almost upon me and im glad, im starved! I have not talked to Thomas much today so far, but i have majority of the day ahead of me.

My moms advice on me moving out...... It is just like I discovered in life - Your life in the 20's is an ever changing facet as you are trying to grow which is why I have always recommended not getting married until you are close to 30. You are still discovering your values, goals, etc. You have to "Know thy self" and what you are about before you can make a permanent commitment and you are still in the progress of learning and finding your way.

Tuesday or bluesday Today i am in a quiet mood for some reason, cant really put a finger on it, just am. Days like this i just sit back and watch other peoples actions and think about the concerns in my own life. For lunch today i had Chicken noodle soup and some Orange Strawberry Banana juice from *Dole*. I love that stuff but its 130 calories in a 16 fl oz bottle, but oh so yummy! Dont know what is for dinner, hopefully some subway. Work has been such a bore latley, but i dont think its work, i think its me. because nothing at work has changed, it might be that i have so much to do and i am ready to just get it over with. Its so wierd that i dont have much to talk about or mabye its the mood that i am in, eh, ..... Talking to Thomas has been good today and i am glad that i was able to meet him~

Today is a Monday .....since my computer is ill, i must catch up my weekends on the monday that follows! Saturday.... I woke up and went to hang out with J for awhile, we did some running around and we went to Home Depot to get a key made for shelle. He even let me pick the color key that i wanted, so nice. So its official if im getting a key made and stuff. Im excited but a little skittish, but her get over it. I have moved about 2 box's over there so far, but that isnt even a little dent in what i need to do. I need to rent a Uhaul and get my furniture over there, but im sure that will be on Friday. Eh, i hate moving.... Im trying to start over in a way, be better towards my body, and lose some weight. Im going to get a second job, so i can afford a new car, or used. Study my butt off to better myself mentally, and have J-bug there to help me. It really is a big step for me, but this i will have to do. I want to just know that i can do it on my own. I want to say that i have done this, and not worry about what it would be like to do so, when i am 40. Kinda like something that i need to get out of my system. I am leaving the life that i have had for about 3 years now, and that is hard enough as it is. I cry on occasion and just remind myself that its something that i want to do, just hurts to do it. I have to stay strong and buck it up, or else i will be where i am three or five years down the line, and never had moved a step. I had to face reality and make a move before i get buried. When you want something done you have to do it yourself, eh. Sunday.... I woke up and J dropped me off at the tanning place, so i could hit it for about 30 min. Then he surprised me by a clean car with some pizza in the back for lunch. We went to his house and munched on some pizza and watched the tube, he mowed. Then he took me home and i relaxed and got some more stuff together. Lazy sunday, as they should be. Monday.......MOnday.....MONday.....MONDay......MONDAy.....MONDAY Here i am, half the work day is over and im happy about that for sure, ready to get outta here. Today has been busy as Mondays normally are. I have been able to talk to Thomas quite a bit today, he has made em laugh something hard and for that i am thankful. I miss it when he bought me those flowers, that was so nice and such a treat! eh, i guess that was a one time deal. Made me feel pretty and speacial. No one ever buys me things like that, and it was a supa nice change. Today for half my lunch, Jason, Eric and myself went to Bale Honda.....God i want the Honda S2000 so bad, i almost had to grab a towl, it was Awesome. only about 33 grand. Ah yeah, to dream in a world that makes you feel you cant. I will have a badass honda one of these days, its a goal, and it will become a reality. Hint hint, the second job thing! Tonight i will be going home to gather more stuff up and get ready for my move. Im worried about Mika too, I hope its not hard on her, she is used to where she is at. I will have to deal with that...Need to get her some Heart worm medicine!

Still trying to get the house together and all settled in, we are alot closer than 2 days ago thats for sure. Its still very new to me and im not all adjusted yet. Mika is getting better about being there and my fish, well, she is happy too. It has been humid here and i sweat, but it makes me feel like im dropping a few pounds! Ha... The Fourth of July is coming up and Jason and I are going to a Party at Dans. Joni and Charity will be there and i love there company, we are all alot alike. I invited Thomas and Jen and i hope that they can make it. ALthough Thomas said that he may not be able to make it because he needs to work on his paintings. I didnt want to give him my opinion but i felt that he should go for Jens sake. I would not want her staying at home by herself. She could always hang out with me but Thomas and her pretty much grew up together and i know that it would mean alot to her. But i can understand that work needs to get done as well. Im outta of it, its really none of my bizznazz. Just got through talking to Jeremy and he is quite the person, he is going to the beach for the fourth of July. He is the only smoker so i can imagine what his trip will be like. Sam is staying here and going to some partys im sure. He is so handsome, and funny to me. I hope that i see everyone back here again, seems that this holiday takes alot of lives every year. Today for lunch Jason and Eric and I are going to eat some chicken, i love going to lunch with eric he is so funny. The way he lives, its just funny, you have to know him! Work has been ok this week, nothing fancy and nothing really new, just trying to keep myself busy. I have been eating Fruits and Veggies for every meal, and last night i wanted the Olive Garden. I love that place its my fav.... It was good, service was not so good. And just as we were wrapping up the meal i saw one of my old bosses. When i first moved here i lived with my mom, and the ice strom hit. I had been working there and i was a good employee! I called in to say that i could not make it because Trees were down blocking the roads and we didnt even have power. My mom told me that she was not chancing it and that i should call in. She fired me because i could not make it in. She said that they were busy and she needed someone. And then she told me that i wouldnt be able to work at other Wal-greens. Whatever! She is such a bitch, all the other managers there did not like her either. About a month after she fired me, they transfered her to another location. I went back in to drop some film off and several managers asked me to come back. I already had the job that i am at now, but that goes to show you she was a bitch. Anyways, when she came in to the Olive garden last night she saw me, and bent her head down and said: "she is such a bitch" to her man. He said: "who" then she looked at me and so did he. It was an whisper and eye fest for about 15 min of my meal, until i left. What an immature women. She is like thirty something and is a manager at wal-greens, and her man is a manager too! Ha, im sure that their parents are proud. Im the better person, but it still chapps my hide! As we got up to leave and we passed her table she was staring, i turned around to look back at her and she was still watching me, she saw me stare at her, and all she could do was hang her head. She didnt say or do a damn thing. After that Jason and I went and rented "punch drunk love" with adam sandler. It was a off the wall fucked up movie, but good! I didnt sleep very well last night, i woke up twice during the night and struggled to sleep again. Mika was even crashed out and seemed to be rubbing it in, ha. Im going to get off here I need to see my sister and go tan sometime. Get the house finished too!

Here i am posting again, for some reason we had problems here at the house and i lost my blog. This is an old house and if there are two many things running at once, it seems to be too much and it trips the breaker, and it really sucks! Tonight is my second night here in the sauna. I hope that mabye with me sweating like i am, perhaps i might lose a pound a day or something, ha. Its not J's fault and thats why i really dont like to say much about the heat, im sure hes tired of hearing it! And he is a yankee, what the hell, why does this heat not bother him? I know that he has been here alot longer than i, and might be used to it, but damn. When you sit in your room, and then get up and the front and back of your shirt are sweaty, whew. It will just take me awhile to get used to it i guess, i also worry about Mika with the heat. She is not used to it either, and there is no air running during the day when we are not here. When i get some extra cash im gonna buy my own air conditioner for my room. Thomas called me today and i was happy about that, it was good to hear him and talk to him on the weekend. He was busy but took the time to get a hold of shelle. We chatted for awhile and then i had to go. Ken also called, i talked to him for less than 5 min. Its trying to rain here and it seems nice outside, i took a short walk, and jason didnt want to walk anymore because it was sprinkling. sigh, i wanted to walk in the rain, its refreshing! He has been nonsociable since i have been here. Well sorda, he stays in his room alot and dosent come out or say much. So i am left to do whatever, and im still getting used to that fact, because when we just hung out we were always doing something together. Went and bought groc. today and im seriously flat broke now, ah well nothing new there. I have about a hundred bucks for 2 weeks. Time for me too seriously pinch the pennies! Mika may not eat this week, ha, that was a bad joke! Her would never go without food!!!! Thomas has never met Mika, oooh that has to happen. Mabye he can come down soon....... Im going to get off here and watch the tube for awhile, jason is in his room and mika and i will surf the channels! :>)

OMG i could seriously kill at this moment in my life......My AOL story has begun Since i moved in with Jason, i no longer need AOL. So i called and got transfered like 3 times, finally got to the right person and she pissed me off. And i will start my story from there. (Rachel) - a bad bad accent with no clue what so ever (shelle) - only wants one thing, ASAP Keep in mind that she has already ticked me off and you are coming in the middle of the conversation~ Rachel: Ok, Michelle why do you want to cut your service with us? Shelle: Does it matter? I just want my service cut off and thats it. Rachel: I need to know why you want to cut your service off. Shelle: Look here, I hate spam, the connection is slow, i hate pop ups, and because i have to go through crap like this! I have DSL, so i no loger need AOL! Rachel: (smirky voice) Humm, shows here that they dont offer DSL in your area? DO you have DSL? Shelle: I moved, people do that you know. Look, all i want is for my service to be cut off please. Rachel: Well, do you know that for 9.95 you can tie your AOL in with DSL? Shelle: I dont want to do that, i want it cut off. Rachel: You are a valued customer, and have been with us a long time. So we have offers that we can offer you. Shelle: (finding it funny that NOW they want to offer me offers) I dont want that, i just want my service cut off. Rachel: Well, for 2.95 more a month, we can help you out with long distance. Shelle: Rachel, are you listening to me, are you reading off a card? No wonder people dont want to stay, they have to deal with this crap. If you losing my buisness is putting you in a bind, then you are not doing something right! Could you please just give me my confirmation number! Rachel: Have you tried to quit our service before, how do you know that we give confirmation numbers? Shelle: Everyone gives confirmation numbers Rachel!!!! Please cut off my service that is all i want, no deals, just a yes or no, that tells me that you have done this! Rachel: Fine, hold please while i get your number......(She comes back on with a laugh in her voice) For 8.95 a month we can connect you with Yahoo and tie AOL in with this. Shelle: RACHEL, are you laughing at me????? Rachel: No, no, no, im not (smirk) ok, here is your confirmation number Shelle: THANK YOU !!!!!! Rachel: you do know for 19.95 a month you can..... Shelle: CLICK! I probaly forgot some stuff, its hard to remember and write down again.

Last night i was so gone, i got off work and not even 15 min after i got home, i crashed. Didnt do a thing! When i woke up this morning, it was a weird feeling, like i have missed things. I didnt feel refreshed it was like i was in a daze, but im coming out of it. Jason jissed pissed in my tea with attitude. It started with someone asking about having lunch with us, YESTERDAY. And he didnt tell me until today wheni asked him about having lunch with someone else. But i let that slide, even though he would go out of wack over that situation. Then Laura and Him were instant messaging me about eating lunch today. I was super busy, was not even at my desk half the time and didnt know that they were talking to me. I am up at the file cab. when he walks over and gives me a look and points to my computer. This was a attitude look, and i said, i have been busy, havent seen it. And he said "its a simple yes or no". So i said "well mabye i shouldnt go" and he said "ok". SO that is where is stands. Something so stupid and childish, but yet this is how things go on around here. So Laura, Eric and him can go to lunch and i shall stay here. Dont need that crap. Just shit that he does to me all the time, he gets his panties in a wad, when it happens to him. I have talked to Thomas alot today and thats awesome. Im going to get to see him tonight at the movies. He just informed me that Jen is now going, thats awesome. So it will be Thomas, Mary, Jen, and Michelle. I cant wait to see the movie, i have not watched a scary movie in awhile. Jason does not like scary movies, so i have neglected to watch one. I am in a good mood, and i hope to stay in one. I hope jason gets over his attitude and is nice. Sigh Sarah came to me about getting a new Palm. I would love to i truly would, but Mika is enough. I have to think Responsible and not full emotion.

Another day, another penny... and the world continues to turn. Last night i stayed up till about 2am, i was finishing Thomas's cd and chatting with him online. He invited me to hang and watch a movie with him this Saturday. I will go and watch it with him and some girlfriend of his Mary. It should be fun, no doubt. I am not pleased with how His cd case turned out, but if i dont send it, im afraid that it will not get sent. So, about 3 min ago, i put it in the mail. This morning i got up and headed for the gym, at 5:30 AM, damn, im tired. I sure did though, got up and worked my big butt off. The snack shack here at work orders do-nuts every morning, and my fav do-nut always seems to make the cut. The soft glazed do-nut with the lemon filling. The big ones, oh man they are so good, and i havent had one is quite the while. When i get my water every morning, i see it. For security reasons the do-nuts name and the wanter's name has been changed........... We will call the do-nut~ Frank the wanter~ Selma Selma gets up and scratches her head, her long BROWN hair covers her eyes and she is slightly awake. She remembers having a dream, a dream about things that she dare not talk about any other time. Lemon filled Do-nuts by the name of Frank jumping over fences and taunting her till no end. As they jump they leave little drops of filling everywhere. Selma says to herself "someone should clean that up, someone could slip and fall". She comes a little closer to the dreams cream, as she bends down to start the "cleaning process", she stops herself. I cant do this, its just not right, something feels wrong. She runs away, and does not look back. What a strange dream Selma says, as she gets up to get ready for the day. She heads to the gym, and as she walks on the treadmill, she can only think bad things about herself, as she sees her reflection in a window. She trys to free her mind as she listens to a mix cd that was made not two days prior. Sweaty and Tired she heads back to the house for a shower and clothes for work. Slema reaches work and heads toward the snack bar. The snack bar is a Little space that was dug into the side of a room with two nonappealing windows at the entrance. A board sits in right behind the windows, that always tells the speacial "guess what" food of the day. A black board with colorful pen writing on it, like they allowed there kids to pratice before taking them to school. The people that work there are people that have seemed to have the worst life, and it shows in their apperance. Hair nets are a must, and it is required for a blind person to work there and run the show. Right behind the blind person is a old Black and white TV with everyones reflection in it as they step up to the counter. I have no idea where the camera is, prob, right under the TV. The camera is for the Lady with the eye illness to keep track of her customers! wha?.. Selma grabs the Styro-foam cup from the huge spring container and heads toward the ice and water. She turns to go to the counter, and there it is! In the Plastic container just like in my dream. Its FRANK, and hes staring at me. The Jelly that over flows from the top turns into a shape of a finger and directs Selma toward him. No Frank, Selma yelled! Every hair net in the place turned towards the scene that Frank was making. Selma backs up slowly, she hits the Breakfast buffet portable island. It moves and she struggles to maintain balance. She falls and the floor is cold to her. Frank comes running at her, and jumps on top of her. Rubbing his filling all over her, and his glazed softness touches her skin. Selma dosent know if she can take it. She says "NO" and wacks him with her ID badge. She regains her footing and runs out of the snack bar. Back at her desk, she thinks about what happend, and the softness of Frank. She really wants him, and wants to taste him. Selma knows that she must be strong, and the day will go on. Breakfast at its best~

Last night i came home after work and watched some tube for awhile, then got up and worked in Photoshop a tad. I got aggrivated so i gave up on it, way to go eh?! I went for my walk and then as soon as i got back into the front yard i went around and started the mower, and mowed the grass. I went in and watched some more tube, then popped in a movie. I watched American Beauty again. I love that movie and Jason had been wrapped up in his game and i had not seen him for hours now. Mika and me, trying to keep cool and chill out. Last night Jason finally opened up and i was happy, hit the sack about 1 or so. Today, this morning, has been the same ole stuff, work work work. called my sis yesterday, i guess she was working late, didnt get to see her and give her her gift. mabye tonight? ah well... ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Just got off the phone with SIS, she worked late and when she got home she has to take Elizabeth to the emergency Room, she had stuck some toilet paper really far up her nose and couldnt get it out. Poor Sis she works her ass off and still gets no time to her self. I have not been here very long, but from what i have seen of her life, she deserves so much more than that. Although she has built a great life for herself, she has a nice house and her BABY, good job. Although her boss is a selfish bitch and gives her way less than she deserves. She puts in so many overtime hours and gets hardly a glance from it. My sis has been having some problems with her health, and it has taken a toll on her as well. I think with all that she has gone through so far, i am very very proud of her, and still look up to her as the Big Sis. She is still crazy and fun to be around, if she would ever let it lose. I think that i might give her my Blog address for her to read. Its not much, its my thoughts and my activites, but mabye she would find some enjoyment in it. ha.....Im tricky about who reads what i think, not that i have things to hide, just the fact that my thoughts are really all i have.

Holy Crap has it really been this long since i have posted? (spankings lay ahead for shelle)... Friday Morning i was up at 6:20, and went for my walk. Got back and started to pick up the house then made my way outside to garden and dig alot. After that i figured that since i was hot and sweaty i might as well wash the car while i was at it. I washed Sabina inside and out and took her to get her vaccumed. She was smiling from ear to ear. Then i went inside and started to get ready for Dans party that night. Eric came over and we hung out for a bit then went ahead to the party. The Party was a blast, it was fun. After the drinking and feeling good, we all started a game of Dominoes. Now that was fun, we were all cussing and telling each other to kiss our ass! I was hoping that Thomas and Jen would have showed up, but they didnt. We all sat out on the back deck and torches and candles gave off sweet light as we listend to the tunes and talked. Some danced. Saturday Morning i got up late, it was 5 min until my aerobics class started, i jumped up and got dressed, hit the car and headed out. I got there and the lady told me that the lady that teaches the class hurt her back, and there are no more classes!!! I was sad for her, but pissed off. So my tired eyes headed back towards the car, i got back in and took a yittle napie! Got up and started to work around the house again, then hit the road in search of a shirt and to go to the 21/21 salon. I waited for the Salon to open but i got tired of waiting and left. After my other running around i went home, J was up and around and wanted to go out a little. So i hopped back in the car and we headed out. Jason wanted to get our own Dominoes to play at home. You would not even think about how hard it is to find the Plain Black and White ones!!!! We went to...Wal-mart,mardells,the game room, hobby lobby,hobby town USA, ToysRus, and finally found them at Target! They were the off white ones, but that was damn good enough for all the running around the we had done. I didnt want to leave Toys R us, because of all the board games! Risk, chutes and ladders,candyland, connect four, battleship, oh man i wanted them all! Games are very expensive for those that have not checked them out recently. They are like 30 bucks for a board game. No wonder your mom and dad always said "no"! ha..... SO we went back to the house and played around a bit then Eric showed up and We got dressed and went to Becks. It was fun, good food, about break your wallet, but good. I got them on the Touch machines on the bar that was fun! Played the Photo hunt and other games. Sunday, eh, not a good timeto be a girl if ya know what i mean. So i layed around for a couple of hours in pain! Then i forced myself to get up and around. I am not able to stay laying around for very long, it bothers me to do so. I have to get stuff done. So i got up and Eric came over and jason Eric and I went to Sams and bought some good stuff. Food and bevs. Then we went to Wal-mart to get a Grill. Bought one and headed to the house, eric stayed to put the grill together and Jason and I ran to the store for some buns and hamburger meat! We came back and cooked, ate and it was fun! Then we sat around and talked a bit then he hit the road. J and I came in and watched some TV and played some Dominoes again. Then we went to bed.....snoooooooze MONDAY MORNING! Jasons alarm didnt go off, so he rushed into my room and i was woke up by him screaming in pain! He was right next to me on the bed, and Mika was barking at him. I opened my eyes to see and i was trying to keep mika away from him and he was sleepy and screaming. We were already late and jasons arm came out of socket again. He half ass dressed himself and we went to work. We were 30 min late to work. His arm was still out of socket when he walked into his office. It popped back in about 5 min after that. My vision was so blurry and i was tired. My hair had not been brushed and i had no make-up on. My dress was half ass, and i knew what kind of day was ahead. The office was busy and everyone was running around. There was work piling up on my desk and i was about to pass out! At lunch i went home and put my keys on the entertainment center and they fell and knocked over Mikas dog food all over the floor. Yes this is my day so far........

Friday ~ Friday Today for some reason i came to work with my head held high and a huge smile on my face. (ahem, could have something to do with 3 in the morning)! Damn that was awesome. But i was ready for my day. Jason got home about mid-night last night. And once again today he left at 8:14 and i will not see him until about 10 tonight. There was a whole lot of drama in my family yesterday. My brother is sleeping with my other brothers girl, shit like that. Im glad that i was not apart of that situation. I might go see mom today after work again. I enjoyed spending time with her. Today i didnt even take Sabina out for lunch, i went with Char to Subway and to the land. Im sure Mika is wondering where i am, and why i have not let her out for lunch. Poor baby girl! Brout Beatrice back a sammich and we our fat and sassy now! Last night i was sitting at home and i was talking to Thomas. He asked me what was for dinner and i told him that I was going to get some celery and munch on. He told me that i deserved a pizza. I laughed and told him that i couldnt afford one, better yet, did i need one. So i was outside smoking and a pizza man pulls up to the house. I said:" Thomas did you order me a pizza"? he said that he did. I went inside and he told me to open it, so i did. On the inside there was a note that says:"hope this is better than celery" "chips and dip are 99% fat free"! with a big smiley face. He had the guys up there wright me a note on the inside of the pizza box. I was in shock, that someone would go to such links to do that. That is a quality that is hard to find in people. Someone that is spontanious and is all about some time and effort! Loved it, he got brownie points with that. Oh yeah, and he got me a 2 liter of coke too! hehehehehe awesome The day is starting to slow down a tad......Have to get Mika to the vet! sigh

urlLink Brainbench - The Measure of Achievement This is an awesome site that i ran across. It has a whole bunch of free tests that you are able to take. If you pass you can buy a certificate for like 10 bucks. It has lot of options and its totaly worth a look! Here is a personality test from here, and here are Shelles results : PART 1: PERSONALITY EVALUATION Trait Range Trait Introverted Extraverted Candid Considerate Impulsive Cautious Excitable Relaxed Practical Imaginative Concrete Abstract Range Your Social Boldness: Introverted VS Extraverted You are moderately introverted. I bet you hear this a lot, "You are so nice." That is because you do not have a brash, bold personality, instead you are warm and friendly and a pleasure to be around. You are not into the wild, crazy nightlife scene. To you a nice social atmosphere tends to be a quieter, more comfortable place where you can spend time with good friends. Your cooperative nature is especially pleasant in a group atmosphere where decisions must be made. You may not always be the person who initiates conversations or talks first in a meeting, but when you have something important to say you are willing to share it. At times you can be shy, but this does not mean that you are being standoffish, just that you are cautious and need time to assess the situation. Your Agreeableness: Candid VS Considerate You are moderately considerate. You are an agreeable person. This means that you are well liked and people really enjoy your company. And why wouldn't they? People can sense that you are taking a genuine interest in them and this makes them feel special and as a result, they have high regards for you. With your altruistic personality, you get a lot of practice at making people feel special. In fact, you feel great joy when you help others. Another nice feature you possess is your ability to cooperate. Not everyone can do this, so it is very important in a meeting or social situation to have someone like you present in order to maintain a harmonious situation. This comes from your tendency to want equality and fairness. In dealing with others, you prefer not to manipulate people instead you tend to be open and sincere. This makes you a popular and well-respected individual. Your Self-Control: Impulsive VS Cautious You are very impulsive. You are an independent thinker. You do not need a book of rules to tell you how to behave - you know inside what is right and what is wrong and you act accordingly. You are able to live life spontaneously, because you are able to make decisions without endless deliberation. In fact, when you and another person are making a decision, you are able to reach a solution fairly quickly while the other person has to cautiously plan every step. Eventually, they will agree with you, which is frustrating when your first impulse is usually the correct one in the decision-making process. You tend to be a little more casual, and you do not feel out of sorts when your home or office is not perfectly neat. In general, your life is pleasurable - you know how to have fun and will never be accused of being staid or stuffy. Your Anxiety Level: Excitable VS Relaxed You are very excitable. You do not like stressful situations. You tend to react emotionally to stress, which can lead to bad moods, or even anxiety, anger, or depression. You like to be treated fairly, and may become upset if you sense that someone is trying to cheat you. You may find urges and cravings irresistible to the point that you are giving into them even if you know you will regret it or feel guilty later. Sometimes you may feel uncomfortable in social situations, even thinking that others are judging you. This self-consciousness may show through as shyness, because you do not want people to think poorly of you. You tend to worry and are apprehensive in unfamiliar circumstances. Your Openness to Change: Practical VS Imaginative You are moderately practical. You tend to be more comfortable when your daily activities are familiar and unchanging, rather than constantly in a state of flux. You prefer to deal with facts and not ideas. You prefer to be more practical and pragmatic, but you are able to be creative when the situation calls for it. You prefer the conversation or situation to be more straightforward. Emotionally, you are more conservative and tend not to express your feelings openly. You have a proper demeanor, which summons respect from those around you. The way you Think/Reason: Concrete VS Abstract You are very concrete in your thinking. You tend to prefer the plain, straightforward, and obvious to the complex, ambiguous, and subtle. You might even regard the arts and sciences with suspicion, regarding these endeavors as abstruse or of no practical use. You believe that intellect should not be equated with intelligence, as intellect is an intellectual style, not an intellectual ability.

I am having some kind of break down i think. The last time i started to feel this way i packed up all my stuff and moved to another state. And that scares me because i dont really think that im ready to move. Sometimes i wish that i could just get away, get away from it all. I feel that i am not appreciated at my job, as if i were to not show up no one would miss me, they would only get upset that i have not come in. I feel that everyone wants a chunk of my time, but toes get stepped on when others are not chosen. But at the same time i feel that i dont have enough friends.Im stuck in a constant spinning circle that never seems to want to let me off. I need to get into something that will occupy my time and that i can be good at. I clean the house and mow, garden, read, and bundles of other things. But as soon as they are done i am left looking for something else to do. I have mowed the yard twice in the last week. I blamed it on the rain that made the grass grow. When i am done doing whatever and letting J have time to hiself, i want to spend time with him. But he seems that he could care less to do so. Things were diffrent before i moved in, but to really think about it, they were not that diffrent. I am in a state of daze and confusion, without all the good drugs to get me there. I want to go to school or classes, and get a good job with people that are not like people that i work with now. I need to get a second job, because i make no money to do shit with. I guess im looking for someone to be proud of me, and i have done nothing for anyone to be. I want to be good at stuff that matters. Jason and i argued last night, well more like i argued with myself. He just does not get stuff that affects me. When i am upset he still does not come out of his room and try to talk to me. He has to know that it does not matter what i am upset about, he has to put forth the effort to figure out whats wrong. Its only a matter of loving someone. I do for him. I know that he is diffrent in that way than I. But he cant just turn me off or go somewhere away from me when i am mad. Things will never get solved and it will only build. I have learned to keep myself busy while he is doing whatever in his room. I have to knock on his door and ask if he wants to come out and smoke with me. Then right after the cigg, hes back in there without a word spoken. mabye i am being too wierd, nah. Last night i was so messed up that i didnt know what to do. I cried, i laughed, i threw things, i moaned, i stared in space. The whole time that i was going through this, not once did he come and figure out what was upsetting me. Last night i got off work and went to spend some time with Jeremy. We went to Subway and watched about 30 min of a movie then i split to see jason. I had a good time over there with him. He is diffrent when he is alone then here at work. Its funny how those things are. I tried to see if thomas was online last night and he was not. I didnt talk to him very much yesterday, it was a funny day. I wonder what the hell to do next, i want to drink from the devils cup. If i were to move, would people miss me. Have i been a passer by in the lifes of few here? Just like a gust of wind i can be gone and no one would care i assure you. I want to be held and talked too. I want someone to understand me. why is this so hard to find? Mabye because im too hard to figure out. My life is a complete mess right now and i have no where to turn. fuck...~...

In texas if it rains, majority of the time its gonna cool off. when it rains here, it just gets worse than it already is. Sigh.. Getting up this morning was not so bad, and it was super cool in the room. I was on time t o work and had no problem at all. Last night Mika was laying by jasons door to his room, thinking that he was inside. I had the door closed to his room and its usually like that when he is playing his game. Poor baby girl, she was tricked. Jason called me not to long ago and said that it would be about 9 before he showed up tonight, but he would be showing up. Given that he is really buff and works out alot, he was korny about it. sitting there talking, he was like "brb". Then he got up and walked away and started to take off his shirt. Im not stupid i know that he wanted me to see, ha. Then he came back and sat down without a shirt on. He sent me a couple of songs that were pretty cool. I talked to Ken last night too, he misses Mika and would like to see her soon. I was thinking that mabye next week he could have her, although its going to be hard for me to give her up, even if it is for a week. eh. Jason called last night and we talked for about 5 min, he was busy and ready to settle in. I watched my Blind Date, and that new show......where the 5 guys are gay and they turn straight guys lives around!! It was an awesome show, and i think that im addicted! damn.... Thomas was a talker yesterday as well, and that was cool. I didnt catch him online last night, he must have been busy painting. SO here i am wondering what i will do with my night tonight. Although i will admit that it is nice to lay around and do what you want! ha Today after i left the house at lunch, there were come carpenter guys that were by the side of the road working on a house up the street! I drove passed them, there were about 7 of them. They all stared and smiled, whistled, and such. Then one guy grabs his heart and stumbles out into the road. I smiled so big, it was so sweet and romantic! It was like he had never seen something such as myself! It was not a play face it was a serious face. I waved at him and he waved back. It just made my day for a man to do such a thing. It was very romantic and i loved it! Here is the front page of the Second Salon. Last night was a lazy night to say something at all. I came home and Started to pick things up around the house. I went to the ATM to get a Check Balance, and then headed off to the doller store! I found so many things at this doller store i was major excited! I had never been to this one and they seemed to have it all! I picked some stuff up including some paper towls, plates and forks for the party. After that i headed back to Subway to get the exact same thing that i had for Dinner the night before. Her so silly! But i had collected 2 whole stamp cards. So the last two dinners have been free for shelle. I ended up scrubbing the kitchen floors and rearranging a tad. Scrubbed the cabinets and the walls, plus the stove and washer. I swept and vaccumed and made sure that things were starting to come together. Jason stayed at Devils Den last night, so it was Mika and I. Ken called and ended up coming over for about 30 min, i had a check that i needed to give him for half the Phone bill. Then he left and it was Mika and I again! I cleaned up some more and watched some tube. Then i ended up going to bed about 1am. I had this really weird dream last night: Jason and i were going to Visit Thomas, and he lived kinda a ways away. We got there and hung out for awhile. Then Jason and i ended up going to bed, well, we slept together in the bed, all night long. Come the morning Jason goes out to the car to get some stuff. Then Thomas comes into the room and says that he can tell that Jason and I slept together. He starts yelling at me and throwing things. He tells me to get the hell out! Then about 15 min after he storms off, his dad walks in the room. His dad hands me like 4 checks, totaling 100.00. He tells me to take this money and never return. He tells me to never contact Thomas again and to stay out of his life.

OK, i just read Thomas's blog and according to that he does not plan on attending my party. I can understand the fact that he is broke, but i dont really know what to say. I cant get him out of the house, and it seems that when it comes to partys and me, he has yet to attend. Im not going to worry about it any longer, if he cant come for one reason or another then its a good reason as far as i am concerned. And i shall leave it at that. Things that i would like thomas to know, but feel that it might hurt his feelings...... 1. Your work is awesome, but get the hell out of the house...There is life beyond that. 2. Stop trying to impress everyone, and just be yourself no matter what the cost. 3. If you are broke, say "i cant do that" or just make it up some other time, dont throw yourself in a bind, to make something happen. 4. Take some time out of your life, and get some sleep and do what you want to do! 5. Depression moves in fast, try to think of other things that dont get you down! Although i am guilty of 1-5, but its good and useful info for Thomas! He needs to expand his daily routine or nothing will happen. This is not because i want him to come to my party, this is because i read and talk to him about his daily life and i feel that he needs this. What he really needs is a vacation, needs to find a buddy and just get the hell away for awhile. Trust me, it can do you wonders....Colorado here I come! Jason is leaving me once again, I am jealous and beside myself at the same time. I am beside myself for the fact that i kinda seem lost when he is gone. I have always lived with someone and i am having to learn that i am on my own. Even when he is there, he is doing what he wants in his room. I am not used to that and im trying to get comfortable with living this way. I have Mika and she loves to love on shelle. I hope that i can make a little Money this weekend at my garage sale. I dont have much, but i need all that i can get! I hope that it will be a cool day and not so humid. Im excited about the party, even though we may not have many there, that suits me just fine. I wrote my dad an e mail, and i wait on his response. My mom in Texas will get a phone call from me tonight, and i plan to clean some more tonight! Ken mentioned that he would like to hang out, i have not made my mind up about that either. Well, i have about 6 hours of work to go...oh yeah!

So the office will be bare and thats when i like to be here, tisk tisk, imagine that. I have talked to Thomas slim this week, i didnt go to dinner with him on Weds. Ever since then i have barley seen him online and his talking has been few words. We are talking about getting a whole bunch of people together and playing some D + D. That would be supa~cool to watch, people get into that like white on rice. Perhaps i can learn, i have always wanted to. Mika and her tummy are starting to get a little better. Last night was a movie lazy night, and i think that tonight might be the same! Yeah Yeah and its Friday and i plan on staying home, sigh. Mabye because im already broke and i know it! Mabye i could play "guess whats in the fridge" tonight. Jason has been extremly nice the last couple of days, whooo rah Ken is getting a tad edgy, but will watch Mika while i am in the mountains! I just need to be loved and touched and , oh my.....
