Hump day has arrived and here i am still arriving. Today i have found out that i will not get my painting that Thomas has painted for me. The rain has scared him away, and he does not want to risk it. Also i will not be having dinner with him tonight like i had originally planned. I asked if i could bring Jason, along and it was a "private party". I will just not go and Jason and i can go out and eat somewhere. Jason does not deserve to stay at home, he needs me. HEhehehehe On other subjects, the rain is still here and i love it. Its cooler outside and i love the sound of the rain. Last night was so nice i fell asleep listening to the rain and thunder. The lightning that i was watching drifted away as the eyes closed, and i love to fall asleep like that. I actually had a good time yesterday with Jason, he watched Queer eye for the straight guy. I had fun watching Jason watch the show. I like to spend time with him like that. Its almost lunch time here so i gotta run! Back from lunch, oh yummy! Jason and I went to eat at the Macc. Grill and im full of bread and pasta stuff! Now i need a nap, and some love making!

Things to think about....... ~While we have the gift of life, it seems to me the only tragedy is to allow part of us to die- whether it is our spirit, our creativity, or our glorious uniqueness. ~Dont cry because its over, smile because it happened. ~Treat your friends like you do your pictures, and hold them in their best light. Taste the other side of the mind, all of us have some, some just never let it out.

I just got back from having Sushi with the boys! The guys were awesome and were right up my alley. They were into comic books, loved to talk about music! One of them has read "The Art of Deception" and we had a discussion on that too. Both of them are super smart and very nice. We had sushi, then went to the purple cow for a shake. I watched them draw and we all talked, it was an awesomely good time. It was good to see Thomas again, he was looking very nice and well. We made jokes and cracked on some things here and there. It was really cool because at the purple cow, thomas played cuda on the jukebox! I love heart and he didnt know that, it was like a "no shit" kinda thing. I am home now, just walked in and as you may know i am in my room doing my blog. Like a good girl, no spankings! Mika lays outside my door, but i dont want to let her in, its too hot for her. I feel like i want to go back out and hang with them. One of them asked for my e mail address and im glad so we can keep in touch. The one that works for Bedford is moving on the 7th. He is moving to Boston for school, im bummed out about that, but at least i was able to meet him! The other one actually sang "michelle" by the beatles to me! And it was very correct in his accent, it was a nice change of pace......Good Job Thomas! Congrats on showing me a good time when i needed to be shown one! Gotta go, i feel like reading or playing with the camera, perhaps shelle take a smoke then play a bit! See ya!

This Monday is almost over, and that puts a half smile on my face! Tonight i will be going over to eat with Thomas and his friends at the Sushi place. I hope that the traffic does not catch me up, because its horrible that time of day. I want to talk to my dad soon, it has been awhile since i have, a couple of weeks or so.

Monday.....sweet Monday....when the week starts and you always start late. I have not blogged this weekend, i was quite busy for all of the little two days we get. Friday we prepared for the party and finished final errands. Saturday we prepared some more and started to cook, i mowed the yard and put all the Tiki Torches out. I did some last min things for the outside and inside. Here are the people that attended... Eric Dan Cylinda Joni Charity Janeane Beatrice Jacob Bessie Charles Bruce Jimmy Mom Jim and of course Jason Mika and me...... It was alot of fun and i everyone had a good time. Everyone went home about 11 or 12 and Joni, Charity, Janeane, Jason and I went to my moms. My mom had some uncles and aunts of mine over there playing Poker. It was sooooo much fun, we all laughed, drank and lost money! That ended about 3am. Sunday my mom calls and wakes me up, she says that My sis and her are going to head to the Mall for some shopping. So Jason and i went over there and got to see my neice. My mom, sis,jason, debbie, brie, my brother, went walking around the mall. It was alot of fun and im glad that i was able to go! This morning we go to get in Sabina, and her battery is dead. Jason left the keys in her all night!! So he called Eric and Stacey from work to come and give us a jump. I told him, that if he had told me what was wrong i would have walked across the street and knocked on someones door to give us a jump. There was no need to call someone from work and have them take 15 min to get here, when it can be solved in 10 min or less! sigh And he says i dont think sometimes. So i was late to work and could only take a 30 min lunch so i did not use up any more annual leave time that i can not afford! I cant wait to get the hell outta here and go to colo. Sometimes i think Jason wants me to move out, but i dont feel much like getting into that. My teeth are hurting, and im having problems with my dentist. I have AOL problems, and i owe Jason some money. All my shit is starting to pile up on me. I think that Jason has no compassion sometimes, i had a problem with Mika this weekend. SHe was bleeding all over and i couldnt get it to stop. Somehow or another she had got one of her back nails caught on something and it was ripped out. I was freaking out because she was in pain and i could not stop the bleeding. Jason just continued to cook and never turned around the see if it was ok. And then had the nerve to ask me to move out of the way while i was in the floor with Mika in my hands, trying to get her to stop bleeding. I was a total bitch this weekend......last night jason dropped something on his toe, and screamed and moaned, so i jumped up and ran to him. eh, i snapped at him and i shouldnt have. But he stayed in his pissy mood. He screams like he breaks something every time, and i jump up to help him. Everytime he stubs his toe or whatever he screams like he is crying and i run to him. I guess im not used to a man acting like that. When i stub my toe i bite my lip and go on. Just diffrent in that area, and i have to understand that. I have certain feelings about something and if i say something i dont want to sound like a bitch, but if i blog it, its off my mind. I dont know when he gets paid or whatever but..... Thomas said that he could not come to my Bar-b-Q because he could not afford too, but then he wants to take me to eat 2 times this week and they are not fast food places. Plus the fact that all the gas he will use to come here twice this week. I guess i dont understand and i am kind of confused.He can meet people for whatever reasons, but wont come to what i invite him to. Is there a real reason why he didnt want to come? sigh, im not going to worry about it anymore, its blogged and off my mind. This does not meant that i am mad at him, or that i think diffrent of him, its just a thought. Work sucks no doubt there, i want to see my mom! Joni and i are going to start cleaning houses for a second job. I think its like 500 dollars a month extra, but its 6 nights a week. So there goes my time but money will be coming in and that will not be too bad, i guess. My afternoon here is going to be so long, i wish i loved my job and time could fly past me................ Sleeping on couch makes shelles neck hurt. Sweet dreams to the one that needs something sweet. A sweet change is more like it, fuck.....

Thomas called me last night and i was in the shower, i got busy with packing and totally forgot to call him back. Please dont think it was on purpose! I know that i talk alot about Thomas in here, so i figured that i would be nice and post his daily thoughts and movements..... urlLink drinking milk and drawing people Last night i watched Two episodes of Queer Eye for the Straight Guy. I watched them right before i went to bed, and wouldnt you know it i had a dream about them. I drempt that they came over to help me pack for my trip, is that crazy or what?! Im counting the hours till i leave for my trip.....5 or so to go!

Tuesday Moody Blues..... Tonight i will have to pack and get ready for my trip to Colorado, im very excited about going! Jason and i will take off about 3:30 to catch the plane. Our plane leaves at 5:30, so we should arrive about 10:30. We have a two hour lay over in Dallas on the way there, and on the way back we have a layover in St. Louis. My Camera is packed already but my clothes are not, hummm. Mika is already at her baby- sitters and i have someone taking care of my fish and watering my plants. Work is so rough when you are excited about something that seems to take forever to arrive. Thomas has his buddy here from Holland, and hopefully i can get the chance to see him. Josh is moving this Friday to Boston, and i am bummed. I doubt that i will be able to see him before he goes, i will be in colorado. He is a supa-sweet guy and i hate that he will no longer be close. I need to call him and see if i cant get a hold of him. Bob has kept in contact through e mail and he rocks! Im glad that i have another Geek bud. I wish thomas was able to come down more often and see shelle and Mika. Joni and Charity will be leaving me and heading out towards Palm Beach at the end of the summer, and those are my party gurls. No one to get drunk with! Ken is watching Mika for about 7 days, and i am thankful for his niceness. Planning on getting my hair done when the money is right, well i plan on doing alot of things when the money is right and no longer tight! Today is Jeremys B-day and he wants me to hang with him tonight, im afraid that i cant, i have too much packing to do, eh. I will make it up to him when i get back. Some awesome places were shared with me for when i go to colorado, all thanks to my RP buds! SunyBuny Railbird The_jake Thanks guys! Hopefully i will blog from Colorado on the laptop! Stay Tuned.....

Sunday night/Monday morning, what have you? I am here tuning in to some RP, and digging some Bob Marley. Today was busy from the start to finish, and as you can see im not totally done, eh. Today i got up and went to my step-sisters Birthday party at my moms, she has turned 26 today. The house was full of screaming kids and people that think they know it all. I dragged Jason along just for kicks, poor guy! My mom, Jason and I would sneak outside with others not knowing and take Cigg breaks. After we had way to much, Jason and I left to go shopping for some new luggage. He has had the same luggage for years and it was already passed down. Not that i dont like passed down stuff, im the queen of that. Garage Sale you say? Im so there! We ended up finding some and they want your paycheck from last week and the week before, but he got it anyway. After that we grabbed some grub and wentback to the house, watched two episodes of "Queer eye for the Straight Guy" and now im here. Oh yeah, we also hit up Barnes and Nobles! We decided since the plane trip might be long coming and going starting this Weds, we might want something more to read. This Weds im off to Colorado and not coming back till Monday! Siked, but the 2 hour lay over in Dallas on the way there, and ST. Louis on the way back im not supa happy about. Im from Dallas so, im sure it wont be that bad..... RP is messing up on me, so i guess thats a sign for "good night".......Bye guys *kiss Kiss*

Last night was really awesome and i had a blast. The movie was good and left all of us with the same look. The kind of look that people are spaced out and quiet. It was not quite what i thought it was going to be, it was better. The Crew: Thomas Jason Jen Matt 2 other people that i just met last night and feel bad that i dont remember their names. and me Matt turned out to be a computer geek like us and is also into Photography! 5 of us are totally into films and Photography. So when we get together it turns out to be a pretty cool time. My tooth started to hurt in the movie, but i tried to just control it. I didnt want to ruin anyone elses time. The producers and the Director were there and as cool as we hoped. They talked to us a little before the movie and answered our questions after. After that was over we all headed over to the Purple Cow to grab some din din. Thomas wanted a shake, and Jen and Matt split an "adult shake". All in All it was awesome good time.... Last night when we came home i noticed that Mika was still acting wierd. She had been acting wierd for the last couple of days. She was eating and drinking but she would act skittish and run and hide under things. She would not come out when she was called and thats not like her. She loves to be around people. She would look around all the time kinda like she saw a ghost and then she would run away. This morning i got up about 7:30 and took her to the Vet. She got her last shot and i put her on some heartworm medicine. She was negative for heartworms and physically she was awesome. But you can never be too sure! Turns out that she had a slight ear infection and a sore throat. So we got her some medicine and she is all set to go. The vet was concerned that when i went to Colorado, that mabye something tramatic happened while i was gone. Tonight Jason and I have been invited to hang out with Joni and Chairty or go to Hot Springs with Jen and matt. Humm, gotta decide. Joni and Charity invited us first. Mabye i could tie the two together. later.....Shelle

Last night i was posted up alone, Jason was off working at one of our parks. Mika and I enjoyed the alone time tho', and i was calm about not hanging the pictures. I watched a good movie that i caught about 15 min into it. The movie's title was called "Cube". urlLink All Movie Guide: Cube It was the first time in a long time that i have caught a movie on the sofa and been so into it, that when it was over i sat there and didnt move for about 10 min. After that was over i flipped and flipped and nothing seemed to tickle my fancy except the commercial for "pretty women" that is coming on tonight. That is like my all time fav. movie. I think it has something to do with the whole fairy tale, ill show you type of thing. And of course i guess it helps that Julia is my fav. actress. Richard Gere is a hottie, i never believed the whole gerbil thing. Sean Connery can do it for me too, its the accent and his looks are not shabby either. SO what did i end up watching.....Grease. That John Travolta and his sexy hips. I love to watch Olivia Newton John as well. I remember when i was a kid i would watch those movies and pretend that i was Olivia and sing all the time. Of course thinking that i might get John Travolta didnt help either. Jason and i purchased some badass pictures while we were in Colorado and had them mailed to us. We went and picked out the frames for all, and i have been very excited to see them on the wall. Well The wall that i would like them on is kinda a thin wall. So before i started hammering i looked at the clock and it was like 9:30. Not very late i thought to myself, but being the person that i am i will go next door and make sure that its alright. I grabbed Mika and we headed next door. I was kinda hesitant about doing so, the guy is like 18 or 19 years old. He shows complete intrest in me, and (ahem) im not intrested. So he kinda always wants to talk to me at the wrong times type thing. The kind of person you duck from when coming in and out of your house. Kinda reminds me of "Ghost Busters". When she is always going to her apt. and trying to sneak by and there is that nerdy guy that likes her alot. Well, hes not nerdy, just too young, and well im not intrested. Anyways i walk outside and start over to his pad, and i see that all the lights are off and there is no glow from the TV. So i play nice person and dont hang any of the pictures. I figured that i can just wait till the light of the next day. I turned out some of the lights and let the already burning candle give off nice light. I flipped through the channels some more and found Sixteen Candles. This is an awesome movie that i have not seen in some while and was happy bout it. During the commercials for the movie, i wrote 2 letters. One letter goes to Jasons dad and the other letter goes to his mom. They are Thank you letters for the experience that they included me in. Colorado, i will never forget..... Caught up on some of my E-mails, Robert and i E-mailed back and fourth and i wrote an e mail to daddy. Robert informed me that he will not be able to make it to tonights movie. I could kick his ass, but in a nice way. Im glad that Thomas is still coming and i think that Jason will also be apart of this as well. Mika cant go, so i will leave her a treat when i leave the house. My teeth are still giving me problems, except its not the same one, now its on the other side of my mouth. Pure pain for the past 18 hours, eh. Now the pain has spread into a headache as well. I feel like i want to drug myself up and hit the bed for a nappy nap. Movie tonight..... Northfork, and the twin polish producers will be there tonight before the showing. Im excited about that, Thomas will be there! Im out...bye
Here are some of the pictures from my trip! urlLink Yahoo! Photos - Thumbnails View

The first day back was not as bad as it could have been, i had alot of work so the day went by kinda fast. I got off work and went to pick Mika up. She was so happy to see her mom, as i was very happy to see my baby. Brought her home, her little ears flapping in the wind. I got home and Thomas called to talk, we talked for a little bit, then some buds pulled up. I dont like to talk on the phone when people show up at my house. I think its rude. SO i hung up the phone with Thomas and told him that i would call back. I spent about 15 min talking to Jason and then Thomas's pizza showed up! yes yes, he ordered me another one, very sweet. I ate some pizza, then my tooth started to hurt. Didnt feel like talking on the phone with my tooth like it was, so i didnt call him back. I went to bed early, and felt bad about it.

Today is my first day back to work since my trip and a big SIGH for that! I will start you from the start......and here we go! WEDS~ To the plane we went and arrived in Dallas for our two hour layover there. Dallas is so huge, but i still consider it every bit of home. We ran across the airport and got on the tram for the rest of the way. Finally reached our boarding place and we grabbed something to eat! BTW- starbucks is not hard to find in that airport and thats how it should be.....Drive through please. We hopped on the plane that will take us the rest of the way to our final destination (Colorado Springs, Colorado). We arrived there at night time and it was dark so the mountains were not seen. Jasons family picks us up and show us our rental car and take us to our rooms. We go to sleep, for tomorrow is the true start of heaven. THURSDAY~ I set the alarm for 7am, i dare not miss a second of this trip. *buzzzzz buzzzz* I swing my hand over and find the off button. I open my eyes and throw the covers off. I felt like it was christmas or something. No makeup and straight Jam jams on i head for the door. I unlock the 2 bolt locks that are normal for a hotel room and open the door. OMG, i almost fell back against the wall, the view was like no other. The sun was starting to come up and the Moutains were dead ahead. They already had a orange, red and yellow glow. With a purple and blue background. The wind was gentle and cool, and (ahem) no humidity! I took a couple of steps to the railing and just stared in awww. I ran inside to grab the camera and that was the start of the picture taking! Royce(Jasons dad), Jason and I went to the store to grab some grub for the week. There just so happened to be a Starbucks in the store, so it was a nice pick me up. Groc. were bought and coffee was in hand. We headed back to the room to unload and Jason happend to sit his double shot expresso on the side of the car in the trunk crease. I took the last of the groc. out and closed the trunk. SPLASH, went the yummy drink that jason had only two sipps out of. oops says shelle and she lowers her head. Her says sorry and he forgives her. After that we all load up and head out to The Garden of the Gods. urlLink Garden of the Gods History We walked around on the trails and watched the Rock climbers. We took pictures and it was a wonderful first visit. The rocks were cold when you would touch them, it was strange but very awesome. After Garden of the Gods we headed to Pikes Peak. There is a train that will take you there. urlLink Pikes Peak Cog Railway Home Page It was a very tight and small train, but bearable. The train ride seemed to take forever to reach the top, i guess mabye i was excited. I let Jason have the window seat because im a nice person. ha. Once we reached the top it was a temp. drop and everyone pulled out the sweatshirts and jackets! It freezes there every night and its so high up that trees do not grow there. The elevation is extreamly high and alot of people cant take it. Earlier that day the conductor said this kid hopped off and took off running and passed right out. Our bodies are just not used to that! I had no trouble, but Jason was sick for a couple of hours, and he was feeling all better once we came back down. After that we all headed over to Fargos pizza place. This is a huge Pizza place mainly for kids. It has a huge arcade and desserts for your fancy. Instead of them calling your order number out it show up in a mirror that is hung on the wall. Kinda Snazzy.... The kids loved it and thats the good thing. We ended up hanging out and playing for the rest of the night. FRIDAY~ We all headed out to the Royal Gorge. urlLink Royal Gorge Bridge and Park in the Canon City, Pikes Peak Colorado area There is also a way to ride a train through the bottom of the Gorge itself! urlLink Royal Gorge Route Railroad, Train ride through the spectacular Royal Gorge of Colorado. Daily departures year round. Located in Canon City, Colorado. We did the Arial Tram and all! IT was so awesome to stand on the bridge and look down, it would most def. give you the heebie Geebies! You could see the train down below and the White Water Rafters! What a site it was, i recommend this trip! Also while we were there i took a Helicopter ride through the Gorge. It was 65 bucks and i was tempted not to do it. It was tricks and a fly through the gorge. The trip was awesome, and def. not for the soft person. I got to wear the little headphones and pressed a button to talk. Of course i requested for a fly by! Im sure the pilot thought that was original! I was yelling and had a huge smile telling the guy to punch it! And Jasons sister looked like she was going to hurl the whole time! Talk about an awesome ride that i hope i never forget. After that we took the Scenic highway back to town ........ SATURDAY~ We got up and headed towards the wonderful 7 FALLS. urlLink Seven Falls the grandest mile of scenery in Colorado We hiked and some rode the elevator down and up. The waterfalls were wonderful, and can you imagine....its privatly owned!... We then went to old Colorado city and went shopping....here is the store that i fell in love with there! urlLink Barracuda Bazaar I had a blast walking around with Jason and going into all the shops! After the 7 Falls we headed out towards the mall. Then Kay, Jason and I headed out towards the bar! We played Pool, darts and had a good time! SUNDAY~ Everyone was up early and headed out to the church. Jasons dad is a preacher and we were going to watch him preach! The service was good and i was impressed. Afterwards we headed out to a amusment park for the kids and (ahem) the big kids. Stayed there awhile and headed back to the mall! MONDAY~ The rest of the family was off to the planes at 8, so we were up to say good-bye! Jason and I didnt have to go to the plane till 2, so we shopped around a little, headed back to the rental place to return the car! I almost cried at the Colorado air port i didnt want to leave! another lay over in St. Louis and we were home at 11:00 last night. And a working day today.... So there is the low-down and im sure t hat i forgot some stuff, so stay tuned!

This is an early post,(not that early) but i have not had my coffee yet. Agenda, so i dont forget.... Tonight Jason and I are supposed to hang out with Eric, go out on the town. My mom wants us to go to Marthas Bar and hang out, they are having a big party and alot of my family will be there. Saturday Jason and I are supposed meet Eric at 10 in Searcy, his car will be in a car show and I would love to see that. Saturday afternoon we are supposed to go over to my Aunts house and have Bar-B-Que, Swim, and Poker. You can sit on your pity pott all you want too, just remember when you are done, dont forget to flush!

Today is most def. a better day here at work, whew! It is going by really slow, but other than that, total groove here at the Tourist Hut. Today i had lunch with Stacey and Eric. Those guys are so crazy, we were a hootin and a Hollerin at lunch. After i watched Jason leave this morning to go out to one of our parks, i was walking back into work and i couldnt help myself but stop and give it to the guard. It went a little somethind like this: Me-Why were you laughing at me yesterday? Him- (stutter) I was not laughing at you, I was laughing at something that was going on in here. Me-Well, I saw you nod at me, when she asked you what you were laughing at. Him- I was not laughing at you I promise, I promise I was not. Me-ok (walks away) Pigs will not Prosper! Great Weather for Snuggling and im all alone! Sigh

The people that i work with are crawling up my spine and im trying to shake them. I deal with them every day and you would think that i would be used to them with me being here over three years and all. They work very close to me, there are two of them. They are the kind of people that will act like your friend then turn right around and talk about you. Its the same ole thing no matter where you go, but they seem to have a A+ in the art of talking complete shit. And to add more, they always talk about each other as well, so who really wins in this battle? Anyways the one that sits right in front of me got busted today, and one of my buds overheard her talking about me. Of course he told me and i asked if it would be alright to confront her,he said yes, so i did. She was shocked and couldnt say much, when she replied her head was down the whole time. Thats suits me just fine, it does not bother me that she talks about me, because im not the first one and i wont be the last. But i felt that she needed to know that she was caught and that i knew. And that gave me a release for now. My other problem today is one of the Security Officers here,he needs a foot in his ass, and im just the one to give it to him. Hes a jerk and an asshole, and i have had enough. So that is also on my calender. The Security Officer that sleeps and reads books while peoples radios get stolen out of the parking lot he is supposed to protect, go figure. Fucker..... The vengence of Shelle, round one.

Last night was a time and a half, and it was worth going for. We all started to show up at the Steak House and turned out that there was about 20 of us. We hit the bar up then went to our tables to eat. Everyone laughed and passed out presents. I had the Beef Tips with onions and peppers, oh yeah, its as good as it sounds! I went out to the car to get moms present and then i brought it inside. I was kinda wierd about giving it to her in front of all those people, i didnt wanto them to think "shes giving pictures of herself to her mom". But my mom always says that she has no pictures of me, and thats what i fell back on. SO she opened it up and she was so happy, she hugged me twice and everyone wanted to pass it around the huge table. Lets just say that Shelle got a little red in the face at that moment. Everyone was saying what a nice gift it was, and how i was moms pride and joy. After that we headed off to Baseline Lounge, the local bar that my moms been going to for years. So i walk in there and go figure, they were having Bush League. The pool league that i actually went to Vegas with for the National Pool Players association. I havent played pool like i used to in about 6 months or more. I just kinda gave it up and started in other things. When they saw me everyone gave me a lashing about why i no longer play and they wanted me on their teams again. I miss playing, i really do. But i have so many other things going on at the same time, that im not sure i can get back into it hardcore like i used to. I used to play 7 days a week, 2 leagues and tournaments on the days that im not playing in a league. So i played a couple of games for ole times sake, and tossed back some coke with cherries. I semi-wrote Robert back a quick e mail, so now that is done! Thanks Railbird for your E mail, you rock! Kisses to you....... Thomas, where have you been today? Mika was in a playful mood at lunch, i watched a re-run of the West Wing, and headed back to work. and here i am....

I might have mentioned this site before, but its a good one. If it were the case with me, i am 23 going on 22 with a smile. For her gift i ended up getting a really nice frame and putting some pictures of me in there. She has no pictures of me and tells me that she needs some all the time. I dont think that i take good pictures, so pictures of me are few and far between. Jason and i went looking for her a gift last night, and at one point i even had a plain ole gift card in my hand. I just didnt want to give her a gift card. What i really wanted to do was give her a day at the spa, but i cant afford that. Not only can i not afford it, i have never set foot in a spa, i would be down right jealous! ha. Tonight we are going out to eat and then to the local bar to have some drinks, play shuffle board, and pool. Jason is out of town tonight, so i will be doing this alone. Although it would have been nice to kick his ass in pool! We will meet at Coltons at 7, and i guess be at the bar about 9-9:30. Happy days are here again when you are tossing back whisky and Gin. In other news, Mika is as fine as wine in Spring time, and is doing alot better than on Friday night. Her loves me in case everyone has forgotten. My brother seems to be doing better and off the shit for now. There is no time limit on how long he can live without it, so we shall see. Him and his girlfriend, eh, are living out of a hotel seeing how his landlord told him that he had a week to get out of his old place. I really cant see how they didnt tell him to get out before now! oh yeah, they have a cute blond ferret. Its a stinker, and loves to play hide and seek. Shame on me for real, because i have not written Robert an e mail back yet. As many times as i have reminded myself i could have taken the time to write him back. Its not that i dont feel like writing him, or the subject of the matter bothers me, its just that i get busy and forget. *Shelle pulls out Sabor and taunts herself with a lashing if she does not get in gear* Thomas has been doing good with keeping up with his blog and im proud of him. Slacking can become very sport in the art of blogging, but you tend to lose out on so much. Keep up the good work Thomas! Oh yeah, Robert, ever thought about starting up your own blog for the circle of readers to enjoy? When are we going to play Some heavy duty D&D??? Talk about some off time, but she is retired now and she deserves every bit of it! Still need to call pops! Star- yesterday, pills down the throat.

The clouds have grown thicker and the sun has ceased to shine, on this Monday, Monday of mine. The day has gone by fast and for that i am thankful. I have been installing alot of patches for the new "worm" virus today on stupid peoples computers. ANd as you know, stupid people tend to take up alot of time, eh. I didnt eat lunch and now im starving. For lunch i went home and gave Mika her medicine, i tricked her and hid it in a hot dog. She never knew what hit her! I also put her ear medicine in her ears. I need to make sure that im getting it in there and her hair is not blocking the goodness. Then i came back to work for another busy rest of the day. Tonight i need to go buy a gift for my mom, tomorrow is her birthday . I have no idea what to get her and i wont when i go to look. Im broke and thats nothing new, but i cant pass a gift up. Jason will not be able to attend the party tomorrow, he will once again be off working and i will not be able to see him. Poor thing, he needs a break. I wonder if his parents have their letters and cards yet? Will it rain this weekend? I need to E-mail Robert I need to call my dad I need to get some rest! waiting on 5 and wishing for darkness.

Here i am once again, a long night that i cant seem to fall asleep. Its 2:35 am, and im watching a good movie called "The Evening Star". Its a really sad but true movie that reminds me kinda of my mom. During the commercial breaks i continue to read "Pattern Recognition" by William Gibson. Stuck in two time warps when i need to be in asleep mode. 7 comes early and the 5 o clock till time to go seems to take forever. I also caught a good movie earlier than this one that was very awesome. I had been wanted to catch this movie for awhile now and i finally have. "Pay it forward", is very nice, sad, and very well put together. Kevin Spacey was my draw to it i will admit. I have never seen anyone show such emotion and do it with such power that is real. I actually teared up at the end of this one. Note: The later it gets the more stupid the Info commercials get! Getting a second job is still very much in my future and i hope that others dont think i have tried to forget about it. Jason has been asleep for about 3 hours now and i have gone and checked on him 3 times. I love to watch poeple sleep, they are absolute angles. It was hot in his room so i put a wet washcloth on his forehead to cool him off a bit. Then i actually caught myself sitting there and watching him. Watching his eyelids flicker as if he was dreaming something so wonderful he wanted to open then and make sure it was not a dream. The slight flickers in the tips of his hands and the grumpy look he can get from being in pain. It really is the quiet moments like that when you start to really think about what is importent in life. I often wonder if people think and go thru the little things that i do. I guess i will never know since people read, but never any response. I can never seem to get off my ass and get accomplishments done. I am truly letting my life pass before my eyes, or am I? Is working your ass off to get a good education to get a good job worth as much time as it takes? Is it a waste of time? I feel like i have to get in school and make something of myself soon, as i am getting older quick. Because what i want is a good paying job that will secure me for life. But i blame having no cash now, keeping me from jumping in the school pool. If i went to school at night, there would go my second job. And just because you go to school, does not insure a badass job. So should you waste the time to do so? Sigh I wonder what others are doing now...oh yeah, sleeping! Even my dog went to bed an hour and a half ago. ok, im gonna try to hit the sack........Its 3:15 or so now. Good Night People Of The Laughter....

Last night Jason and I ended up heading out to Hot Springs to meet up with some friends. I really had a good time, but wished Thomas could have been there. It was totally awesome to see his work hanging up in the hallway. It was so intresting and wonderful. Something that alot of people wish they could only be givin the chance for that. We had some dinner and then smoked some Arabian Tabacco and chatted. Jen, Jason and i walked down the street to go to the nearest "Hot Spring". We came home around 3am. Today my mom called me and wanted Jason and i to have dinner with her and some of my family. So we went and it was nice, then afterwards we ended up going over to their house for awhile. Petted the horses out back and soon after hit the road. Jason has shingles and he is in alot of pain. I feel sorry for him, and there is nothing that i can do for him. He will be gone alot this week on the job. So once again, its just Mika and I. i need to call my dad..........I need to Email Robert back.

Work sucks arse today and so does my old ass co-worker with nothing nice to say! Grumpy for no reason, i think she forgot her pills..... I would love to sit her down in a room (like in a cop show) and let her have it! In other news today, i went to the dentist! Good news and bad news! Here is the lowdown I have been going to this other dentist for about 5-6 times. She insisted that i needed a deep gum cleaning. I told her that i could not afford it and she howned me until i was able to get the money together. Telling me that my teeth were going to rot out, blah blah. So i had it done, it hurt like hell, they have to go under the gums and clean! Then she tells me that i need like 4 Root Canals! I was thinking, why would i need root canals and i have no cavities? So i took myself to another dentist that was highly recomended. He said that i do not need any root canals and my teeth were fine. I do however need to get my wisdom teeth out, they are putting pressure on my teeth. That will be hurtful, seeing how they are full grown and i have to have bone cut to get them out. I will survive im sure, just pain to look forward to! I wrote Robert a quick e mail..... Fell asleep reading my book last night, then woke up at 4am, having the damdest time going back to sleep..... Jason leaves me more every day..... Ken and that AOL problem.... Guys up at work wanting to kiss me.... My body is still ugly and i am not nice to look at! What will i do?

Whoa, has it really been this long since i have updated? A "im sorry" goes out to the fans that are Loyal.... FRIDAY~ I did away with plans with Eric on Friday, Jason sent me an E mail saying that he was tired. SO i went ahead and thought that rest would be best for him. We hung out and rented movies. Ended up seeing Dan and Cylinda at the movie store. I got a french movie and Jason got one of his picks. Its good to see my mom have fun,and its all good. I really wanted to Pimp out Jason, but 300 dollers was not enough for some double Ds. So i refrained and sat back in my seat. After that we went to the movies and watched S.W.A.T. The movie was good, but the plot really sucked ass. It was the kind of movie that they gave you no details on what happened before or after in the peoples lives. Went home and hit the sack...... SUNDAY~ got up on sunday and hung around the house. I had some chores laid out and got threw with about 3or4 of them. I ended up reading my new book for hours and letting the other, do what he wanted. My new book, if i have not introuduced it is: urlLink Barnes & Noble.com - Full Frontal Fiction: The Best of Nerve.Com Found out that the book is messed up in the middle and non of the pages go togther. Goes like, 84,95,87,67, that type of shit. I was pissed because i was hard core into this book and its all messed up. I had to like go 5 pages ahead, then 7 pages back. eh.... MONDAY~ worked, worked worked.... After work i had Thomas and Robert call, they were in town and wanted to hang out. I was excited and wanted to go for some food and fun. We ended up eating at the Olive Garden, so yummy..... We were laughing and joking and Robert drew me. That is the first time that i have ever been drawn in my life, it was cool. Robert had the idea of saying that it was Thomas's birthday and having all the crew come over and sing to him. I thought it was a really cool idea, and im up for funny stuff. So i excused myself and went to the bathroom, i told the lady that it was his birthday and had the deal set. They came over and looked at Thomas and said Happy Birthday. Thomas said "its not my birthday" with such a face, it was sooo funny. Robert and I said "YES, it is Thomas"! So they sang to him, and when they left, Robert and I got it! ha..... I t hink that Jason had a good time, and i think that its a good idea, the four of us. After that we all headed off to barnes and noble. I ended up telling the people there about my book and everyone split to look at things. It was funny, like we were having some sort of book worm war, as we drug each other around in shock, that they have not read "this guys book" or "this guys book". Was starting to get a little scary... Jason bought us all drinks and i was happy that he did that. It was a very nice gesture. I ended up getting another book at barnes, jason picked it out for me. urlLink Barnes & Noble.com - The Devil Wears Prada This is my new book! After that we all went back to our house and hung out for awhile. Watched some of Howerd Stern (Jenna Jameson), when The West Wing was not on. That pretty much sums up the night, it was fun and we had a good time. I want to make Robert a CD, and i want Thomas to make me another Groove CD. I want to much..... In other news, i am so depressed about my inner and outer self! Sigh, wishing i was attractive and that people can get aroused by looking at me. Thinking that mabye i scare some people. Outta here

I come out of my room into the darkness of the house. I squint my eyes to try and see making sure i dont trip on a little black animal as i make my way to the front door. I open the door and hear the sound of much needed oil, and wonder if it made the same noise when this house was built. I step onto the old need to be painted porch, and thank myself that there is old paint on it, for im sure that splinters would then be involved. I lean my head to the left because of the hanging plants, that i thought was a good idea months ago. I make my way to the chair in the corner. I sit and look around, i notice the dead silence. I look up thru the tree limbs to the moon on the other side. The moon was very bright tonight, and i guess that made the cickets want to come out and throw prewinter party. The only light that was on was the orange light that got brighter when it was attached to my lips. I sat there, in silence and wonderd where everyone was. I could hear few cars in the distance and the wind made no presentation tonight. Tonight is just another unwelcome night of being nothing.

Last night was not a nice night to say the least. I had the cops called on me...... Here is the low-down Yesterday at lunch Jason Eric and I went to drop off the movies at lunch. YOU HAVE TO understand, we are very careful with our movies that we rent. So we dropped them off and headed back to work. Well last night about 9 or after, the phone rings and it is some women from the Movie Gallery. She pops off attitude to me from the start to the finish of the conversation. I still remained calm, and we went up there. Jason was pissed because anyone who knows jason knows that he is like the most honest guy. Jason went in there telling the lady that he gives his word that he returned the movie and that he knows it was in there. The lady popped off attitude at him and told him pretty much to hell with his word, its the empty box she is looking at. She never even tried to talk about working something out. She was rude to Jason and was already rude to me on the phone, but NO ONE speaks to jason like that in front of me. We went out and looked in the car, drove all the way back home and looked in the house again. NO CD! We drove back, i told Jason to wait in the car and i was going in. I was going to come at it from another approch and be totally nice. I told her that we have been renting from there for more than 2 years and we have never had a problem. That we know the cd was in their when we brought it back. It took her damn near no time to start yelling at me. I asked for her boss's number, and she faked looked around and told me that she could not find it, but she could assure me that he would call me back! (YEAH RIGHT) Then i was not goint to make a comment on her calling me with attitude, but i did, i told her that she should not be calling peoples houses so late and giving them attitude! Me-so when did you become manager? her-yesterday Me- oh, haha, figures her- dont you try that with me Me-The other manager would not have done us this way her-well hes not here, i am, and this is how it is her- im going to call the cops and have you thrown in jail! Me- you cant get me thrown in jail her-im pressing charges and you will be thrown in jail Her-yes i have a IRATE customer in here that will not leave the premisses (her calling 911) Me-call the cops, i dont care. The Cops do not scare me, what scares me is how you are running this buisness! There were guys in the back on my side, telling me to fight for my right to rent a movie! They were making me laugh! They said that at least i was fighting for a cause! She yelled at me some more........ and i told her that i would wait outside for the cops! and sure enough i waited! He showed up and i told him my peace and he went and listened to the bitch inside! Anyways as you can see i didnt go to jail! BUT, i am not going to pay 25 bucks for a damn dvd that i did not lose! They want a new one im sure, when the one that i rented was not new! AHHHHHH Those people in that buisness are such liers and screwed up anyways. If i knew that i could take it to court and win I WOULD! mabye i can, get a lawyer to get a copy of the tape that was recording that day, from noon when we dropped it off to when i left about 11 last night. For all i know she could have stole it! Needless to say that i am still awaiting a call from her boss, and i am not through with this fing battle! in other news i went to my first YOGA class today, loved it! I might get Jason into it with me!

Surprise Surprise as i posted on Thursday that i wished it was Friday, sure enough a miracle did happen! Afternoon rolled around and all the toilets in our building would not flush, well i was wondering why we had no running water. Then the news finally came around that the construction guys hit a water maine and there you have it! It was about 2 and a half to three hours later when we were told that the Health Dept. was shutting down our huge building, i think that my eyes actually glazed over!! SO there you have it i was able to have another 3 day weekend. I sprinted out of there like there was no tomorrow, and didnt once think to look back! I woke up on Friday morning knowing that i was lucky to not have to drag my ass into work, and as i approched the front door and opened it....cool air! Friday turned out to be the perfect day to have the day off. It was blue skys and about 75-80. I enjoyed the whole day and never took it for granted. I went and did some running around. I went to a new bank over by the house and jason helped me open up another banking account since i didnt have the cash myself. Thats really awesome for reasons that i cant even get into. We had lunch together, and called eric to tell him the plans for the night. Talked to my dad! Jason and i went to Barnes, and he bought me my new book (4 Blonds) urlLink Barnes & Noble.com - Book Search . Joni and Charity Invited us over to there house to chill and we were ready to go. This appt was awesome, it was a upstairs and downstairs and had stained glass. It was originally a church that someone took and converted into appts. it was awesome. Dan and cylinda also came over and we all chilled and laughed. About midnight we get hungry and head over to the IHOP. They got some food and i ate a couple of bites of what Eric didnt eat. Saturday we got up and jason and i went to the local animal shelters. Not that we were gonna get anything, but we wanted to look. It was jasons idea and i thought it was an awesome ass idea, he made me smile. I went to my moms, she was having that big Poker tournament. She has 12 people show up and a hundred bucks a person. Winner gets the whole pot! 1200. I was the waitress and pulled in some tips myself! Then i left to meet Jason and Eric to go shopping. We went to Old Navy of course, thats my store! And we all dropped close to a hundred dollers in there. Eric dropped a little over that, ha. We headed back over to my moms to see how it was going and they were still going at it, there was about 4 people left. After that we headed off to Discovery, its an awesome club. We watched two drag shows and had some drinks. I even got eric to dance a little up on the plat form with me, and jason was up there too. I was happy that Jason was enjoying himself, he likes that kind of music. That made shelle happy! We left there and got home about 4am. Sunday we were up and i layed around the house with Jason, then went to Subway for the two of us. After watching some more History Channel, i got up and took Mika to pets mart in her little bag. She was so cute! She got plenty of compliments about herself, so now she has a big head. Came back and Eric was there. Eric brought his Vette this time, and Eric and I went for a drive to Maumelle. We drove around looking for houses and enjoyed the weather. Came back and All three of us orderd Chinese Food and rented two movies. The hunted..... urlLink Hunted, The (2003) and Real women have curves..... urlLink Real Women Have Curves (2002) RWHC.. was a fantastic movie, it reminded me totally of how my mom treated me growing up about my size and what not. (might be why i have the problems i have now) Then Eric went home, and i started to read my new book....then fell asleep.
Im getting purple streaks in my hair, im siked!

The last two days have not been much to talk about, just pissed off all the time. It is true that women think way too much and sometimes expect people to do certain things, but arent men guilty of the same ever so often? yeah, thats right, we are not to blame. I have done way too much thinking the last couple of days, and that might prove to not be a good thing. When i do not get answers or the same thing that pisses me off continues, i pull myself from it and think about it. Ideas, assumptions and so on are not going good right now. I was able to talk to Thomas last night also, and that was such a break from the goings on. He makes me laugh and hes awesome. I have not eaten for awhile now, no dinner last night and little for lunch yesterday. Im not eating lunch today either, i hope that my body can hold up and not get sick on me. I am just not in a mood to eat and dont really think that i deserve food all that much. Have had no contact from the family, mom and so on. It has been just me and Mika really, and she gets cuter and cuter every second. Im sitting in my room on lunch break, staring out the windows. Jims sister is still hanging on but still in very bad shape, we shall see where tonight brings her. In other news, the job is hectic and the people are still oblivious to there surroundings. I hope to have a garage sale this weekend, i already dont want to, but im so tired of all that crap! Mabye i can make a couple of bucks, and what i dont sell will go in the trash. Losing weight and several people at the office have noticed and it makes me feel good. Sam might be going to another job, so he may no longer work here. I will miss him, he makes me laugh and hes normal, and that is rare at my job! Mika is fine as always, i have not taken her on a walk latley, im a bad momma. I talked to my mom twice in the last two days, she has called and wondered why i have not come to see her. bad daughter! Today for lunch, it was my idea to head out to the Dixie Cafe. I have not eaten there in a long time and i was craving chicken fried steak and gravy. Some squash and some mac and cheese, would be good too. And there rolls are wonderful, butter and honey. Jason does not like to eat there, so i asked him anyways on a whim, and he SAID YES! Mabye it was because i said that i would pay for it, ha. But we went to eat, and i was excited, because he actually went, then he ended up paying for it. I really was in total shock! Humm, dosent take much for me to go in shock, ha. It was an awesome gesture, and i loved it. I guess i will close for today, nothing exciting....

I have just closed the book that I have been reading for the past week or so. I could not express how much I learned from this book, and realized things that I would have never thought about. A life's lesson learned from a 50 cent garage sale pick-up that. Jason looked at me and said "you would enjoy that book". Learning later that he has never actually read it himself, but im sure that he will. This book taught me lessons about myself, lessons about other people and lessons about life. This does not come off as a self help book, this is where you live through other people and finally open your mind to realizations that people try to hide from.. About 15 min ago I closed the book for the first time on completion and had tears in my eyes, and found myself slipping in to a complete wreck. Maybe this book touched me so much because it reminded me of my father. My father is a damn good man, and I love him with every single beat of my heart. I would not be who I am without my fathers influence the small talks on the front porch and when no one else cared to listen, my dad always did. Advice from my father was always locked up and will be kept forever. This books title is "Tuesdays with Morrie" by: Mitch Albom urlLink Mitch Albom urlLink Morrie Schwartz

Just another Manic Monday, i wish it was a Sunday, thats my fun day.... Ah yes, here we are in a start of another week and yet we always wish we could go back to the day before. Work has been good today with all that it could have been to say the least. I have a little over an hour to go. Tonight i will be going to some of my old stomping grounds with my ex (Ken) and playing pool. I miss the game so much, but im nervous about getting back into the scene that i was once in. Not nervous as in its a bad scene, but just the people and the whole surroundings. I dont want everyone to talk shit because Ken and i are no longer together and now here we are showing up together. People are people and they will always talk about other people. I will have to understand that and go on. I was able to chat with Thomas a tad today, more like a second before he had to go to work. No news from Sam, but i didnt expect any. Jeremy has said that he misses me today. Jason is on and off weird, but its better than being a total weird. If i had cable hooked up in there then yeah, it might be kinda hard to tear me away from the room. (until i needed a smoke, dont smoke in the house) Today was the first meeting of the X Committee, this is going to be a long drug out deal and im sure that you will hear more of it. I was in it last year and they put the pressure on me this year to do it again. Without me i dont know what it would be, eh. Need to get Sabina looked at, hers having problems.. I had my garage sale this weekend and it went rather well, good for shelle.

This weekend like most have gone to a total race for time. I have no idea of where the time goes and yet, some of the time I feel like I have nothing to do to pass the time. For what reason or another I always seem to stumble upon articles that are about older women wishing that they were young again. About them losing their looks and speaking that no one seems to notice them. Knowing that there is life when I get older, but im scared of getting older none-the-less.I need to get into shape before it gets harder than it already is. I am almost 24 years old and have no clue where my life is going, that scares me also. I wish I was a sex symbol, I wish that people looked at me and would think about endless romance..wishing gets me nowhere. Work is hectic and appears to only worsen come tomorrow. Mondays are bad enough and there is tension at the office. This weekend I went to Kohls and bought a watch, something that I have not had for years. Its nice and I totally dig it. Right now I have pretty women playing and I am lounging around. Its my fav movie and it lets me escape into romance that is no longer alive in this world. (money helps with romance) My mom (Texas) is here in town staying at Queen Wilhelmena and I will take off a day to go see her. Im excited about that, I have not seen her since last April. She will be here a week, but I will only see her for a day. I need to go see my dad, her misses him. I missed the fair, this is the first year that I have missed it since I have lived here. I was going to go with ken and I kept putting it off. I seem to be very good at putting things off. I wonder how Thomas's dinner was, I hope it was swell. Robert, THANK YOU for leaving me a message! I am afraid to call, I don't ever know when you are going to be home. What ever happened to guys sending you flowers for no reason, or opening your doors. I would not like it all the time, but hey surprise me every now and again! Sigh* Mika wont stop being sneaky with the food... Joni and Charity called me and wanted to hang out, I did. We went to watch the hogs game at the bar, and then I hung out with them later that night. Pretty Women calls me, so I must get off here....

Last night i went to hang out and have some drinks with mom at Baseline bar. Met her up there and she was wearing a red leather jacket with a red leather skirt, black tank top and some black suede (to the knee) boots. I thought she looks dressed to kill even though i am not a fan of leather. Went out there and started shooting some on the back table and as much as i would prefer no one to step towards me they always do. I had this 27 year old come to me and want to play some pool, before i knew it he was telling me about him breaking up with his girlfriend of a year for good. That she was a fruit and that she does not even want to work, but wants everything money can buy (more like she expects it). He was telling me about him having two kids already with two diffrent women, and how he never sees both. Of course growing up in the condition that i did, i told him my opinion. He said that he does not see them because the mother hates him and does not want him around the kid even though he pays child support. And he said that he is going to just do it that way, because thats what she wants. My opinon to him was, he should not do that, that he needs to put forth the effort into seeing his kids. One of 5 right now and dosent know who the daddy is, humm, not right.I told him that now that he has a kid, its not about him and her anymore, its about him and his kid. Of course i doubt that it changed anything, but i felt that he needed to know how-me- as a women alone thinks about the situation. Needless to say that he has made the same mistake twice, and mentioned that now he is snipped. eee gads... So he had beers on top of some shots and drowned himself in his sorrows, while i beat his ass game after game in pool. heh Came home and took a shower and then went to bed, freezing in the house. Had to hunker under the covers with Mika. Jason spent the night at Degray, he was down there working for awhile. I have not heard from him today so far.

Whoa, i have missed a whole week of this. Im getting bad about it, someone needs to whip me into shape. Went to Queen Wilhelmena this weekend to see my parents from Texas. I took Mika, and had a great time, i went up there and spent the night. Its about 5 min. down the road to Oklahoma, so its a neat place. Queen Wilhelmena is a state park for those of you who have never been or are not from Arkansas. Take a look see..... urlLink Arkansas State Parks Pathetically enough i have only been to the following parks (8)..seeing how there are 51 state parks! * Petit Jean *Queen Wilhelmena *Mt. Nebo *Mt. Magazine *Pinnacle *Degray *Lake Catherine *Ozark Folk Center I actually went out and got a cell phone, i figured that i am hardly ever at home so if people need to reach me then they can. Plus my parents and Jasons parents both live out of state, and this makes it better for them. I was also seeing myself in situations that a cell phone would come rather handy, so Jason and i broke down and got them. Monday was a wierd day and im glad its over. Went to play and watch pool last night. Jason will be working at a park for the next two days so i will not be seeing him for awhile. He left about an hour ago, and hes not looking forward to it. (mika will miss him) This morning i was woke up rather madly weird. Mika kept growling and barking, and i shushed her a couple of times. I could hear some dogs outside growling and carrying on. I shushed her once more and she didnt quite, i had had it. I jumped out of bed and went out side, there is a dog that lives across the street and its always in its back yard. And there is this guy that walks these two other dogs, but he never has them on a leash. In our area you have to have them on a leash. SO i jump out of bed and walk outside and there are two dogs trying to get to this other dog behind the fence, i go out in the street barefoot and try to shu them away. They were going nowhere. I marched back in the house and got a damn broom and took it out there to them and shued them away. It finally worked and i was surprised i didnt get attacked, they were mean looking. One was a german shepard and the other was a big black dog. So by the time that was done, i had 5 dogs barking and im sure the people around me were up. This was all at 700AM! SO thats how i was waken up, i let me tell you then next time i see that guy im gonna let his ass have it. ok, im done for now.....bye

What is this life for? Does anyone even read this anymore, or do i really write it for myself like originally planned. This past weekend was Halloween and and it was wierd. I went to a party on Halloween, and i left grossed out. There was this guy there and he thought he was so damn cute with his looks and comments. Needless to say i found him annoying and retarded from the get-go. He was going around and making fun of people but he thought he was cute. He was making fun of people that he didnt even know. He was staring at me majority of the night as he tossed back beers and shots. Trying to avoid any interaction or eye contact with the guy i was stuck in one spot the whole night. He was drinking and drinking then went from being smartass to depressed drunk. Tear in my beer shit, being loud saying that he was a real mother-fucker and what not. Blah Blah Blah I was getting ready to leave and he stumbles over and put his hand on my head and holds my hand and says that he loves me. I over looked that because he was drunk. Then he leaned in and whisperd real close to my ear "when you go to bed tonight, think of me" and leaned forward and gave me a nasty kiss on my neck. I was so grossed out, i went home and hopped in the shower. My neck was so sore from where i had scrubbed it. What is wrong with guys today? They have no concern what so ever. I cant stand a drunk anyways, then really not one who cries in his beer.eh. He is lucky that my dad was not there, my dad would have beat his ass for pulling that shit. Got up Saturday morning and left the house about 6 or so. Went to take Sabina to get her fixed up as a surprise to J. He thought that i was going garage sale shopping. We spent the say running the streets and playing. Saturday night i was invited to go to a party with Thomas but i didnt go. I am sure that he will no longer invite me places out there, because i never seem to go.sigh, he is probaly hates me. Later that night about 9 something, i went to see Luther at market street. We hit every dollar store from here to Benton and it was so much fun. We had lunch at the cracker barrel. We went into a tattoo shop and i wanted to get my belly button re done, i thought that i had let it close up. Turns out that it just needed a little push thru and it was done. So Eric only charged me for the ring. MY MOM ended up getting a tattoo, it was her first. Thats right she is no longer a virgen, ha. She got it on the back of her shoulder blade. It says "Wild at heart" is awesome lettering and it has a heart with a vine. It looks really good. Im glad that i was there when she had it done. Eric did an awesome job. Jason has not been paying much attention to me, and thats not cool. I go with the flow and adjust, but its not cool and i dont know how long i can take it. Is this just a rerun? Have had no news from Robert, and Vance just cracks me up. Sam has not gotten in touch, no Photoshop for him. And Steven says nothing about the movies, so mabye they worked! Went to see Scary movie III last night, it was funny. I guess that im going to cut this off. Shelle misses her painting that she has never seen I want to crawl in a whole and stay there. Monday night I sit here with a smile on my face. Not that anything over the top has happened just a wonderful comfortable feelings, its quite nice. To put the rewind button on fast , here I go. Saturday was so damn awesome. I got up early to get Mika and I ready for pictures. We headed over there and she was the best dog anyone can ask for. She was so perfect and posed for those pictures like she was born to do it. The pictures turned out great and im so proud of her. After that I went and tried to Christmas shop, but I picked a few things up for myself and one for Jason. (I already gave it to him) Im a sucker... About 12:30 I was starved but I figured that I would wait seeing how I was supposed to see Thomas, jenny and Robert at 1:00. I went home and sat on the couch. I waited and waited, I fell asleep on the couch and what woke me was my cell ringing. It was Robert, turns out that he was the only one that could make it. He came by and I hopped in the car and we went to have lunch at the Olive Garden and it was nice. It amazes me how much Japanese he really does know. Its quite intersting. I looked at his art work over lunch and talked about his day showing his portfolio. He took me home after that because I had to go pick up my proofs from Bedford. That night YES YES YES was John Mayer and Jason and I were off to the concert. We sat in the floor section. The concert was badass and im so glad that I was able to go. John was an absolute dream and damn he could play the guitar. I stood the whole time, shook my hips and sang every song! If that concert comes out on DVD, I will be sure to buy it! I wish that every one could go to something like that. Jason was awesome! I think that our next move is to save money and travel to see concerts. hell yeah, im dreaming! Sunday was a gasp of every thing wonderful. I slept most of my morning away on the couch and then Jason said "get up, we are going out and I have it planned". That is music to my ears for someone to be that spontaneous and happy about doing it. I have needed a new pair of black boots forever now and kept putting off getting me some cause of money reasons. He took me to my fav. store *right now* Kohls. He bought me a new pair of black boots and I was shocked. After that we went to some shops and then he drove to the Rave (theater). I was wondering what he had planned for us to see. I looked at the sign of what was playing. Then it hit me that he was taking me to see that movie that I was waiting to see. LOVE ACTUALLY. The movie was better than good and I would watch it over in a sec. Its a wonderful movie, and all should see. urlLink love actually Monday (today) was a fast moving good day at work. Im hoping to move into a better paying job, so I am forcing myself to learn stuff quick. Today, and the whole weekend was gloomy outside, but I had the biggest smile! That's it for now......Listening to Sarah once more

It hits me every year, the breaking down of the family and who will get mad at me this year. I have a dad 3 hours from here, a mom in Texas, another mom 25 min from me, Plus all of Jasons family in Iowa. It gets nasty, when it comes to who i can see every year. And it always gets to the point where im crying and depressed from the guilt trips that people lay on me. Its a point of life, and lets face it Jason is a rare lucky one whos family is still together, all in one place. Jason and I got up at 5 am the day after thanksgiving and got our game face on. We were ready to take on the crowds and nasty nasty people. Hit Starbucks on the way to Best buy our first stop. Lets just say that it was a long day, but we got alot accomplished! Started at 5 and ended at 2. And then i had to go back to Garden Ridge about 4 for the 3rd time... My Thanksgiving was ok, like every year. Had it at moms house here and it involved family that i love to roll my eyes at. Screaming kids with mothers that dont beleive in spanking, ah geez. I would wear a kids ass out quick..heh. These kids are hyper kids at that, going up to people and just screaming, sometimes they throw in a kick before running away. Hell yeah i would bend a babys butt over my knee, with a quickness! No pain no gain, right? Today (thomas would be proud) i cleaned my room. It looks the best its ever looked, very groovy. Did the dishes and cleaned the kitchen. Picked up Mika's poop from the front yard and got the leaves all together. I was busy like crazy and im supa happy that its done. Now i can enjoy it and feel im somewhat free. I still have presents to wrap, i did some of them yesterday. I will be going to Texas and Iowa soon for Christmas..... Will post laters....

Oh Christmas tree oh Chritsmas tree how lovley are thy branches... Jingle Bells Jingle bells Jingle all the way Silent night holy night Rocking around the christmas tree is a happy time of year Rudolph the red nose reindeer had a very funny nose Feliz Navidad Yes, yes yes yes yes I am in the Christmas spirit and i cant wait till the time comes that i will be opening and giving presents.This happens to be my very fav. time of the year. Mika and i went and had her pictures taken today with SANTA! She is the cutest thing i sware. Half of the proceeds go to help animals in shelters and so on, so i was glad to give my buck up. They have a station on the radio that i listen to, its christmas music nonstop, heh, im a dork! Work has been CRAZY, i have been doing 2 peoples job and its stressful. A lady quit in our department and i took it over. I love it, but i rarley have time for myself, its wild. Charlotte and i went to Degray to the Gift show. We have a guy that worked for State Parks and he had Cancer and was very sick. He went to texas to get treated and is back now doing very good. He has beaten the cancer!! Now he is weak and can barley stand, but he is on the way to recovery. So we held a silent auction in his honor and raised 4400 dollers for him. It was awesome, but i know that does not even pinch his medical bills, but its more than what he had! I spent the night down there on weds, and came back to work on Thursday.... I am head of the Christmas Committee this year, like the last. I make sure that it gets pulled off. I am in charge of the: decorations food familys that we will be helping, 8 to be exact toys clothes canned food drive and begging for donations... yeah. cant ya see why i seem to have no time! My christmas shopping is about over, i have a few people to get stuff for, and then im done! I hope that i can see my dad before christmas, i have gifts for them too! Well i guess thats it for now... THANK YOU for my awesome christmas card Robert.....

What am i doing right now?....Im watching the snow fall. Yup, thats right, its snowing here, and its nice *for now*. I like it when its falling and not sticking, but the Ice to follow is not welcome as far as i am concerned. Ah well, ya take what you can get. Grandma is in the hospital. Mom, sis, and i went to see her today. Both of her lungs are full of fluid, and she is running fever. Her blood suger is really high and she is having problems breathing. She is only 69, and that would be rather young.. I hope that she pulls this thru. Jason was supa nice tonight, he took me out to eat, and rented 5 movies: 23 dollers mind you. Its a good thing that we rent from NETFLIX (link to the right of my blog). We just wanted to go grab some at Blockbuster. (call us crazy) Her is what we got! 1. urlLink Seize the day 2. urlLink Owning Mahowny 3. urlLink XX/XY 4. urlLink Sonny (James Franco is steamy and his smile can truly melt someone, or me) 5. urlLink Legally Blonde 2 And the latest from Netflix: urlLink La Vita e Bella (Life Is Beautiful) This is a really awesome movie...I would say you should see this one. Thats all for now, waiting on a package in the mail and wondering if Mika will play in the snow with her mom, heh.

Good Evening blogger..... Today was a busy day at the office, like it has been recently. Today was get extra mad at stupid people day, heh. Sometimes they just need to be put in their place, sometimes. Christmas is among us and i can feel it a little more every day... Tonight i completed the Jason shopping! I finally got my last package from fedex. When i came home there was nothing on my door and no package. I knew that today it should have been here, if not yesterday. So i called up the company, and they said that it showed they tried to make a drop off at my house today. Well was there anything on Shelles door? nope.. SO i went to fedex tonight to get it, and told the lady there that the only way i knew it was there was because of the company, that they didnt leave a doorthing on my door. She said "that seems to be happening alot latley" UMM YEAH, how about lets fix that problem? eh well anyways, was kinda mad about the condition that the box was in, but hopefully i wont have damaged goods! Just got threw watching the Billboard awards on TV. While Paris Hilton was on stage talking, someone in the audience screamed out "Paris is a Hoe". uh oh, i bet she didnt like that. Although i will admit i laughed and thought it was funny, im sure there is nothing on that tape that i or ALOT of people out there have not done,cmon! She is just catching slack because she is loaded and somewhat of a star. Now when it comes to being smart.....yeah, im leaving that one alone. Celine dions hips in that dress were tragic, and jessica simpson needs to lose the bangs. HA, now that i have talked about others, lets talk about me, that could be more intresting...hehehe ok, ok, So we had some snow in the north part of our small simple state today. I hope it stays up there and does not venture here. Mika says hello, and im outta here....
