well i called the place and someone had already put in an app, but assured me that if they dont get approved they would call me. *sigh* When i get home from the second job the people next door are loud and jut plain have no respect, nothing new, as to why i am wanting to move. Today jason finds this place close to the house and im siked about it. We went and looked inside, but now its between us and two others i think. CROSSES FINGERS! I told them that i want it and would fight for it! Yeah i kow that i am only 24, but all i want it a decent place to live where the people around you take care of their yards and have respect. Why is this so hard to find without paying an arm and a leg? So i guess i will know tonight....keep your fingers crossed!

ok, made a choice... I was going to go for the rent house, and come to find out that someone has already put in application for the place, my tummy dropped when she told me. But there is that little light of hope that they will be denied and i can submit mine. Will fill you in later....depressed.

TORN~ Here are my options and I cant make a decision.... 1. Stay where I am living and deal with the crappy landlords, no central air and heat, and a breaker that blows because it cant handle the power of a window unit and the washer. And heaven forbid I throw in a hair dryer somewhere in there. A toilet that I have spent many coins on because I have to have dish soap for it to flush, then we tell the land lords, they have to put in a whole new toilet. The toilet will not flush at all, when you take a bath it bubbles in the toilet. Told the land lords, they sent out a plumber and dropped sudden hints about no female products and whatever down the toilet, like it was our fault. After the plumber visit, no more than 2 days later, the toilet will not flush. Now we are able to semi get it to flush after we use dish soap. yup, right back to square one. This is after we bought a snake and a new suction thing and expensive drain-o. Yeah we do stuff that they should take care of, but we figure we will try to fix it first than to make a big deal about it. Last year we sweat while we would sit on the couch and watch tv because we could not get the house cooled, never complained. This year I told him months ago (before it got hot) about the wiring problem, hey guess what, has not been out yet. And im not even going to go there about our red-neck neibors that live next to us and the bitch on the end. We have lived there the longest with out any problem. The people move in next door and peel out all the time, make a mudpit in my yard, tear up my flowers and bushes.Both of their trucks are wrecked and not fixed or axles are on rocks that they pulled from our yard. Leave their crap in our back yard and are loud. For awhile we had problem listning to their nasty asses have sex thru the thin walls. The girl on the end always wants to park in our spot by our house and the get attitude about it to us, saying that she has talked to our landlords and they said it was ok. If you have not figired it out yet, we live in a duplex.A big house that was split in to three. When i leave i will kill all the plants that i do not take with me, and i will leave the house just like i found it. Spent over two hundred dollers on the yard alone this past spring. 2. Rent house down a couple of blocks. This rent house is alot nicer and bigger. Fenced in back yard and two carports in the front, one on each side of the house for each vehicle. Quite nice.Its almost 4 hundred more dollers a month to rent tho. Split up between two people would not be so bad i guess. It has central air and heat YEAH!!!! Fenced in back yard for the dogs, oh yeah they allow pets, pet deposit, but they allow them. 1 year lease, that means we have to stay there one year. Should not be a problem tho, we have been at the other place over 4. There is no window in the bathrooms, i like windows in my bathrooms. HUGE pantry and laundry room! Good location, but close to a busy street than what we are used too, but its not bad. Nice people around us, good yards. We have been looking forever at rent houses, the ones that we can afford are really shitty looking with window units, i want the house cool for my pups. Lots of options for gardening. I will hate it when someone takes it if i dont.We even paid to have someone give us a list if rent homes in the area, so we could stay on top of what comes up for rent.eesh.Just dont want to jump in here and find something else that is better. We couldnt take it, one year lease! 3. Move to Iowa. I could stay where i am and save a little then move to Iowa.The people are nicer and housing is cheaper. BIG houses in awesome hoods for half the price here. ALthough finding jobs are hard right now, and i hate hate the winter weather there. Would like to be closer to J's family and his sisters kids, they rock. I would move away from all my family and lose my two jobs. Its a small town and i think that LR is small already. I have to remember that i still have a car payment to make no matter what! I dont know what to do, and there are so many things that i want to do. HELP!

I have to give it up for myself that i have been keeping this thing updated. Almost moved into the new house and almost happy with it all. Talked with Chris in "delphia" for awhile on my way to work yesterday, good to hear his voice. Thomas chatted with me for a little while yesterday about things that have been going on around me. Chris B.(you are amazing in your own little way) Today is a rainy day for sure, i kinda like it. It looks like night time early in the morning, feels nice. I miss the kenster, and i miss the giddy feeling of one who is no good for me. I have work to do and i turn my headf on it, geez, i need to go home and sleep. I wish i had my own house, some times.

Some times i think that i am a pimptress.........some would agree,some would hate others that strive for my attention, some would shrug their shoulders and know inside im right, some stare from a distance, some want to rip the clothes off. And what do i do, nothing...i fear the steps it takes to get there.....

So the weekend was so much work, and more work. Moved boxes, furniture, and plain crap over the weekend into the new house. A buddy flipped the switch yesterday on the meter. We were without electricity for the weekend and come Sunday morning a bud broke into it and flipped the switch. We are such rebels, ha. We took pictures of it tho, no getting us in trouble.So now we have light and lovley central air and heat. The place is semi-coming together more like a puzzle that is missing come parts.I worked 10 hours alone at the second job yesterday, whoa im tired. I have to work tonight too, eesh and without Chris. Yeah thats right now i have three Chris's in my life. Watched a little bit of Sex in the city over the weekend. I thought that carrie likes ugly expensive shoes, but shes funny. And the older lady with blond hair is sexier than alot of girls in the twentys, and thats just plain sexy. Isobel and Mika love the new house and im so glad, they just play and lay in the air cond.I will be having a house-warming party soon, Thomas you better be there~ Just seems like i know little now when it comes to my buds. I seem to work all the time and dont keep up contact.Their blogs are short and semi-life because they are just like me, and have no time. What if someone sold time? They would make a killing. If someone told you that here is a time card, this gives you a week of doing nothing but what you want and still get paid, would you buy it. You know its totally legal and there are no strings, would you think it was worth it. Of course it would be a little expensive, because after all its time. Its something that NO one has alot of. Perhaps you could even get a freeze time card... i guess that another story, but sounds good! Went to my moms house on Sat. for a get-to-gether for Fathers day for my uncle Earl and step-dad. It was nice, im glad it was not rained out and everyone had a good time. My cousin was there, and her love life is kinda in the wind. She has been hanging onto this guy for awhile, and she is 27, he is 44 and recently divorced, yeah that makes most cringe right there.We all support, he was taking her to Mexico, and New York. He was giving her the real life, and throwing her money to buy clothes, building a house, car. All this was in a years time as he gets his divource. We are of course jealous because we would all want that, but seems to be a thin silver lining. Saturday morning they were supposed to go and get her engagment ring, and it started off bad, and then just never happend. She cried the whole morning and was a mess, cant say i blame her, it sucks. Now he does the "why are you pressuring me" "why do you want to get married so fast". We besides the fact that now she is in love and that is what she wants, him, the house, and kids. He is recently divorced and hes not ready for another one like i have told her. Its hard, it sucks and she will get over it.... we all do.. I called my dad and wished him a Happy Fathers Day. I miss him so much and thats all there is to that. He is my dad, i would kill for him. Like father like Daughter no doubt, he has done some stupid things in his life, but havent we all? Mistakes are meant to be made for a reason, that is just how lif is. He deserves more than what he has, he really does. I wish that i could win the lottery so i can buy him a house, car, and clothes to lavish in. He deserves that, hes my pops! He has the biggest heart in the world, and i have to say that he has passed down his kind heart and loving eyes, and im thankful. I love you dad for all that you are and all that you will be. You are my shining star.....*Kiss*

Another i hate my second job and all the people that work there. Yup it happens and i think more than it should. Our new boss is ok, but i think he makes alot of bad choices... specially when it comes to hiring people. Yup he seems to be the shitty people magnent.Shelle feels another you can kiss my ass moment coming on. Not going to Texas to see my mom like i thought, because even tho i work EVERY DAY OFF, they couldnt get someone to cover my shift, how nice is that. I think im getting fed up with being pushed around, some would say its about time.The one reason why i dont really tell them off is because i was hoping to move up there and make a little raise or two. eesh (bites lip)Would quit but my bills should be outlawed. I have to work all weekend , yeah for me... .. .... ... . .. .. .. . .. .... .. .... . . . ..

Things are better now, just went into the normal slump, normal? I dropped him like a nasty habit and not ashamed, nope, he had chances to improve. Straight up asked him last night and didnt like my answer, so there you have it. Dont have time for the games, inless its checkers, hehe. Why did i even go thru what i went thru, yeah wont happen for awhile at least a while, ha. Jason has written some words to me that i had no idea, its crazy the things that you miss when you dont look. His words are so true and yet placed in the wrong period of time. He mopes and sighs and i sure as hell dont blame him, because i have been there once, ok more than once. Man i seem so tragic, but its what it is. Eric you are the craziest guy, but so damn down to earth, how do you keep balanced? Your plans and goals are productive and very intresting, you my friend are one of the smoothest. Thomas, where do i start, i am so glad that i have met you. You are ALWAYS there when i need to talk to you and you always laugh at my stupid jokes (did i pay you to do that)? I would love another picture in my house, hell i would love for you to come and spend some time with me and show me how to paint more like i should. Robert needs to come back around, have you spoken to him? How is he doing and i love the comic he did for me! It has been awhile since we have exchanged packages, yeah thats overdue. Ben X~ you are a british cutie if i have ever met one.....Thanks for chatting and taking an intrest in my life. you are the sweetest, and to get up at 4 your time to talk with me, now that is some dedication!

I think that my mind is going crazy on its own, i mean i think its started without me. The gears in my head have been turning 80 turns per second, but only seem to be going in reverse? Whats up with that? I have made contact again with eric, and its nice what can i say.I have never met a guy like him, he says what he feels and thats that. (even tho i dont always like it) I cant lie and say that i say everything that i would like too, umm nope.I would like to fall off the earth sometimes. If i was skinner than i am, would i have some of the troubles i do? yeah i know (dont base things on that) but i wonder, too much. this is what i am take me or leave me..... I have beat someone up for mistreating a blind kid in school I consider myself half ghetto, i always had to hold my own I love animals I live and breath music I am not your harvard grad Would do anything for my pops Would love to say i am more talented than i am I work too much, for nothing, to kill time maybe? I like to eat out....alot I am tired 60% of the time, but have massive energy to keep going I like things i cant have I get let`down alot I get board easily I love photography I consider myself fat and un-attractive ( no matter what you say ) I love to watch movies What does happy mean? I have learned something that i already knew, i guess i just refreshed myself. Dont let your guard down, you always seem like a fool. You got close you got burned, you try again. Now that seems to be the damn circle of life. J-introduced me to a badass site, i think you might like! urlLink Kempa

I am at a loss of words on how some people act, i truly am. I will name no names but he has treated me awful, no doubt about it. Playing games, hardly. Playing to string me along, prob. After awhile of taking it i have bit my lip and decided that i will no longer. I have mentioned it a few times and felt that i was bothering him, so i stopped. He can do what he pleases but i am too old and too busy for the games. Not gonna live around the immature.

Today is Friday, oh yup yup yup. Frankie is visting the office today and he loves it. Want to be careful not to stress him out. He is just going to be here for about an hour, then its back to the pad for him. I work tonight, and its all good, i need some more food for Frankie anyways. Oh yeah hes eating and eating well, very active too! Robert called me yesterday, i was at work and not able to call him back. Thomas i hope that your days are better and you come back with a clear head, if your not back already. Supposed to rain today, bothers me none, just nice is all, just nice. Work at the first job seems to be dragging, but thats how it goes on some days.....

The last few days have been unbearably nice. Perhaps it was the fact that i did not have to work my second job and a nice break was needed. I sure cant get into the habit of that even tho my bosy needs it. I still have bills to pay and i know they dont care much about my health, in less its a doctors bill. Thats just how things are "we are sorry so and so died" "but his bills didnt die with him". Its just a crazed world. I seriously have been breathing a little easier and things have been back to the normal pace, normal as in 7 months ago. I did a little planting and alot of sno-cone eating and straight lounging, oh yeah, the best of times have been upon me, ha. Last night Jason got a call from his older sister saying that she wanted to come down and visit. She wants to come with her 3 kids. Finding ample space is kinda hard and just the fact that the house has to be cleaned. Im ready tho, this makes me have to get crap in order, ha. We are planning some things for the kids to do, we want them to have a supa time. They are from Iowa, and yeah, its a tad warmer down here right now. Frankie is doing splended and eating. He is moving around quite a bit more and loves it when i spray his cage. His little tongue is so cute, he is such a gangsta. Isobel is still acting like she is two months old, and its getting old with me. She needs to get her act together and its the boot camp for that dog. Housewarming party is coming, just wait guys. Robert finally wrote me, titled "the bastard finally writes" he is so silly. Whoa Robert sorry about your accident, and how bazzar was that issue....Stay away from that guy!

This weekend went by fast as usual, that is just how it seems to be. Everyone older than me always tells me "it only goes faster the older you get". Yeah, im excited that i have stuff to look forward too. I walked into work with a smile on my face and no grudge that i couldnt go to texas, it is what it is. Worked all weekend and even showed up an hour early (7am) on sat. to get some extra stuff done. I am a good girl and my Avian Department was awesome (says david). Jason and i went out Saturday night and i decided to drive up to a plant place. This place has been here for awhile and we have never stopped, and i thought we might as well. We get out and get more than we bargained for, but its all good. J and i met a guy that owns the place names Jerry. He happens to look and act like my dad so much its scary. I know what the guy does, if he knows it or not! We bought some plants and ended up talking politics with this guy. He gave us some free plants too, oh yeah i rock. It was awesome and i plan on going back! Sunday night about 7pm i went to get my nose peirced. Oh yeah, i did it. I will post some pictures later of my latest ring.Its a little tender today, but nothing that i didnt expect. Jason went with me, he seems a little less more excited to be there than i thought. I would love to get another tattoo, what would i get? FRANKIE WHo is Frankie you ask? Frankie is my new Leopard Gecko. He was donated and he was adopted my me.he cost me a penny or two setting up his cage, reptiles are not cheap you know~! I named him Frankie because he is SOOOO pimp, he looks like a little gangsta! Here is a picture of a L. Gecko, not frankie, but so you know what he looks like. I seem to be having problems with him eating..... urlLink Looks like Frankie

Here it is Friday night, i just ate a salad with alot of olives. Just finished up watching urlLink Rachel Rays 40 dollers a day. This show can be very intresting. Anyone who likes to travel and eat should tune in. You can learn a few things and get a idea for dinner.Will warn you that i think Rachel Ray is kind of korny, its her laugh or maybe its what she is just told to do. hummm I just learned to laugh at her, makes it better that way. She also has another show called urlLink 30 min. meals . Good for people on the go like myslef.... Paid my bills today and someone might as well have beat me up. Thats life, you spend what you make. Looking for a third job, quite possibly. The local Ihop is hiring and its the hours that i am not working already. Oh yeah, i would love to serve drunks and fight for good tips? This weekend i plan on doing things around the house and getting stuff taken care of. Dave Matthews urlLink "grey blue eyes" playing now.. I actually listen to this album quite a bit, and even over and over if you will. Just good home music... So i was pulled over the other day by a guy, yeah i was stupid for pulling over, but i did. Of course it was the normal, i just had to talk to you bit. Asked for my number i told him that i was engaged (stupid lie michelle). He still persisted and i hate guys like this. They give me the "he will never know" speech. Instead of getting mad anymore, i just laugh and simply walk way, its better that i not give them a peice of my mind. Have not talked with Eric today Ken has not called today, kinda odd Ben's trip to Germany is coming to an end, well see if i get a post card (ahem) Chris from Texarkana has not contacted, he usually calls or messages every day, you ok? Thomas and i exchanged words, how is Jen doing? Chris in Hawaii, i miss you, hows the kid? Robert called a night ago, so glad he is working on another comic, its just badass Chris in LR, your an asshole, glad i dont see you anymore...grow up! Hoyt and Brandon-still going to the club tomorrow night? Tiff called tonight, silly girl Jason, due time things will be better Kelley-man you are something i tell ya, one can get caught up in you if they let themselves Blake-Sunday coffee? Steven-times up, i will have to get my damn money you owe me-watch for me... Ashley, you will soon see what you have become Calvin- hows the kitty? Holley-sorry i never called you back Matt- yes i will go fishing with you sometime Jeremy- u need to step it up Michael-going to the club with hoyt, brandon, jason,tiff, calvin and me? Michael from work- you will get her back

After careful consideration, and a few talks with myself I think that my body is quite gross with the stuff i eat. Ok Ok, so being on the phone with Eric while he goes groc. shopping is prob. what did it. He eats fruit and nuts and all the organic good stuff. He only talks and thinks about things like urlLink Krispy Kream , and never goes there to get the warm right out of the cooker fat goodness. He remembers the taste, and he would love too, but he knows they are no good. Do i have the mental capacity to take this challenge on? I would love to eat healthier and have a nicer body (ahem, a treadmill is coming soon). Things that i am bad about: Pizza~ (Italian food in general) Bread~ Sodas~(getting better at since Supersize Me) Reeses P. B. Cups (they are so good out of the fridge tho) Chips and Salsa get me when it comes to Mexican Food I need to treat my body better, after all it is the only one i got. If you dont have your health you dont have much? But what about all the crappy goodies? Oh me O my how i want some pecan pie....(thats right im from the south) hehe

So this is why Jason is so smart, ha! I will share this link with you and im sure you will be hooked like I am. Thanks for the link Jason ..... urlLink How Stuff Works Bank account was kinda screwy but I guess we figured that out? Isobel extra playful at lunch and Mika just wants to be loved. Work number one is good today and I will hope that work number two will be the same. So I have a stalker as well, kinda interesting. He has my e mail address but wont e mail me questions to get to know me. Instead he looks my friends up via e mail at a workplace. Kinda scary, but it really doesn't take much to do that. (ask Jason) OR go to the link above, ha. Kay and the kids are not coming this weekend like we had hoped. Don't really understand, just kinda want it to roll off the back. I was looking forward to that. So now I have the weekend off, I think I will work instead. Yeah it just happens that way. I would actually like to take some time out this weekend and just take some pics. I have spent little to no time with my camera, actually none since I have moved into the new place. Today seems like a sage color I don't know why, it just does, do I need a reason? Plants and air and sun peeking thru the trees type day. A slight smile from me and a wiggle of your nose makes the day quite complete. Made a really sketchy contract today and made J sign it. Not that I needed it, just to kind of make me stay with my words. Temptation is brutal. Jason of coursed laughed and I had a case of the gritted teeth when I signed. Example: I Michelle Ivy will not buy any Clothes, Shoes, Purses or other unnecessary things for the next two weeks and this also includes eating out. Also means no getting my nails done. I can only pay for my bills and gas in my car to go to and from work. This is for the next two weeks! X Michelle Ivy X Jason (hey I didn't say it was professional, quit laughing) And this is really odd as well because im not a girly girl. Im not all about my looks, but I do want to try sometimes, ha. Trying to save money is my goal, and this is also how I make life a little more interesting on a daily basis. Or maybe I have a huge betting problem, heh.

This weekend was nice and soft. I had to work on Sunday, but got Saturday off and what a difference it seemed to make. I was able to run in the grass with my dogs and Isobel thinks its the cool thing to do to run in front of mama, hoping to trip her. Mika just stands back and shakes her head and she is to mature for reindeer games. I made Jason get up early on Saturday and go plant shopping with me.We cruised on over to Maumelle and went to a nursery that I saw days before doing a co-worker a favor. We bought some Mexican Heather, and some other bushes that I cant think of the name now. Planted them and sweated my toosh off. It was so hot, and I loved it. I had sweat drippig off my face and was downing water like a dying horse (yeah, no one said I was normal). Jason helped me plant some but made it quite clear that he preferred the shade. Counting down the days until Jasons family is in town. 4 days to be exact and that's 4 days that I will stress that all the crap must get done. But im kinda laid back about it, it will get done. I have been kind of laid back about alot of things lately, just roll ya know. I have been touch in go with a lot of my friends, its just a hazard of the two job appeal. Trying to think of some cool things to have Jasons sisters kids do while they are down here. Maybe someone has ideas? 1 girl, two boys- boys are teenagers and the girl is almost 7. It wont be that hard to please them because they are from a small town, so its things that we would take for granted that might be fun. I wish we could run down to Dallas and get some Six Flags, but that's too much trip for a weekend. Went with a bud of mine to get her fourth tattoo. We are the opposite when it comes to that. I have 11 piercings and 1 tattoo. She has four tattoos and just her ears. I guess its all about what you like. I have been thinking of getting another tattoo. I was kinda thinking about an Ivy Vine (hence my last name Ivy) with my dads name. Dunno, may never get another, but they are sure damn addictive. My nose is doing well with no complaints. And I almost got another piercing when I went with Tiff. Thin line between classy and trashy I know, im aware. I put some purple in my hair this weekend and its awesome, I love the color, like a striker color, growwl look out daddys. Listening to Jeff Buckley and its quite nice. I used to listen to him (grace) on a daily basis for like a year almost. It was almost kinda sick. Now i hear him again after about a month of no Jeff. ahhhh. sweet. And i heard the song that has been my ring tone for months now (bittersweet symphony). urlLink http://jeffbuckley.com Yes this site is a daily run across.... Frankie is doing well, i bought him some new live plants and he seems to LOVE to knock them over after mamma puts them upright. It was a game for about 5 min. Then i decided, ya know thats his home, he cen do as he pleases. J and I are thinking of getting a treadmill or a weight set. Crap then i have no excuses for myself, ha. I would love to have one actually. Will tell you how that turns out. Wanna kill some time....... urlLink http://infinitefish.com/ping/

She grew on him like she was a colony of E. coli and he was room-temperature Canadian beef. They lived in a typical suburban neighborhood with picket fences that resembled Nancy Kerrigan's teeth. Her hair glistened in the rain like a nose hair after a sneeze. She walked into my office like a centipede with 98 missing legs

Thursday night and counting the hours till i know i have to force myself to go to bed. Yes, this seems to be a nightly thing. I will watch the clock and i know about 1 to 2am i have to hit the sack. But i guess its good to know that once my head does it, its light out baby. Honestly i know its nothing new as far as some guys go, but what is up with the "im so into you" and then no calls? Its insane shit and trust me im not going down like that, ha. I want to meet some cd mixers and senders, am i the only one out there? I want to meet people who will burn me cds of there fav. music or stuff they think i cant live without. You can always tell the kind of thought that someone put into them too, its great. I will return cds by far, its not a one way street. Packages are so kick ass and i love to get them. Its happened before where i have had a shitty day and get home and there it is, in my mailbox, someones time they put aside for me. Yeah its all good, all good. I love it when they tell you they picked these songs out because it reminds them of me. Thats badass for several reasons.... one: Time and Effort Two:You listen and wonder how they think it relates Three: its just plain sweet by gosh Thomas has a new haircut-cute by the way if i never responded... Counting Crows playing and Mark Rothko is No. 61 (rust and blue) for July..i think its one of my favs. SO much emotion and heart in that one, yup yup. Things i like dammit: Calls for the hell of it, yeah that person is thinking of me! Text me at all hours, i know your up in the weeeee hours thinking of the Shelle? Hell yeah...Ask me how my art is coming, invite me somewhere, but not get upset cause i have to work, knowing ill give you a raincheck. Talking about cheaters with me, or watching it with me and laughing. same as before with Reno 911. Understand that im thick right now, deal with it or get the F off my phone. Responses to my posts, Chris was the only good guy bout that. Thanks Chris... Telling me i smell good, telling me my skin is soft. (and it is) Paint my toenails, massage my feet. Pick me up and tell me we are going to kill the day, and just go out and do crap all day. Take pictures with me. Brush my hair and sneak closeness to the neck. Light candles. Put gas in my damn car. Paint a picture for me. Burn me a cd.Have me laugh so hard i snort (hard to accomplish) Take me to a fountain and you initiate the taking off the shoes to wade in the water. Understand that i do have hard long days and have sympathy for that crap. Ask me if i would like you to kick so and so's ass for being a bitch to me. Take me out in the yard and point the moon out to me and tell me a off the wall story. Watch me when i sleep. Love my dogs and gecko. Surprise visit me at work. Text me even tho you know im working, add a smile to my night. Let me go as fast as i wanna in my car. People watch with me and laugh at my ugliness. Understand that im from the semi-south and TEA ONLY comes with alotttaaa sugar. Remind me to take my pills when needed. Dont treat me like im stupid. Recommend movies to me, and beg to watch them with me. Leave love notes on my car, then hide and watch me get them. When you travel, where is my postcard? Tuck me in at night.Bring me a cover if im chilly on the couch. Tell me that i am everything life should be. Wipe the hair from my face slowley and go in for the kill. Hot Choc. on winter mornings, with marshm. Starbucks at any time is quite tasty i might add. Teach me things i dont know, and let me learn hands on. Run in the rain with me and tell me im soo pretty when im wet. Snocone lover. Ok so im way out there on more than half that shit, but its my friggin blog........take that, ha. So i sent my mom some pictures of me and they happened to show my nose ring. (she didnt know) Well she sends this tcky e-mail about how flattering it looks, like a wart on my nose. And what possesed her kid to get tattoos and piercings?And she wanted to know if i was doing it to be bazzar or to be part of a culture of sorts? Where did she go wrong she asks me! And she wanted to also include that fact her husbands daughter does not even have her ears peirced. But keep in mind this is the same girl that has never even bought her own car at the age of 35 or a tad older. Never married just skips from loser to loser. Always calls and begs daddy for money. NEVER ONCE have i ever called and asked for help. And trust me i have fallen on hella hard times... anyways... blah... Seeing how i never talk back to mom, i was quite shocked and grinning from ear to ear when i sent her a response. Here it is, not the best, but quite refreshing. I do have my nosed pierced very observant you are, I had it done 2 weeks ago. I have my own culture; its called Michelle works too much and does what she wants to do in her spare time. I only have one tattoo, but warn you there might be more. Please remember that piercings are not permanent and I can take them out when I please. I also tan and dye my hair on occasion, it is also not what was given to me, but seems to be ok for the mainstream audience. You are correct Melissa has not even her ears pierced, but I myself think that I have surpassed Melissa in quite a few things in life, and piercing is not that big a deal on that scale. You have been a great mother, and I myself think that you would be very sexy with a navel piercing; its all about preference, not culture. Although this is true that cultures have tattooed themselves and pierced body parts way before we have, but I think it was not to be bazaar, but because of religion and power many times. I think there is a thin line between classy and trashy and I have yet to cross that. I love you very much, you should go with me sometime. Love: your little rebel shelle Funny thing is, is that i was expecting straight hate back on that one, but i didnt get it. She said that beutey was in the eye of the beholder, and no matter what she still loves me? And that i gave her a good laugh and i know how to handle a disgruntled mother? And also to be sure to pass the same on to my kids? ODD, but i loved every bit of it....This is also the same mom who was throwing my stuff at the front door when i got my tongue pierced. She said i take it out or i get out, and i packed my bags.....

What to say what a day... Its just been one of those, yup you know the ones. Work tonight was fast and pissy. My housewarming party is this weekend, yeah for me and people who will now have a reason to drink. Talked to Ben today, oh yeah the English guy. Whoa, his accent was strong, but quite nice i must admit. I wish it didnt cost an arm and a leg to talk to him, or i would more, most def. He seems intresting and i would love to see some of the buildings in his town, or london. Paris is another place, ah yes, in dream mode. Not that i didnt know it already but just telling myself again that Damien Rice is so badass. (The blowers daughter) is nice to start with, as its what is playing now. God i want a Black and Mild. I have a headache I have a strong will to flip the bird Im tired I have alot of work to do I have calls to make, and im not making them I have books to read and they are growing dust bunnies I have a dog that laughs at the word no, and pisses on contact touch I have sexual needs that need to be met, for fucks sake I want to have a Mix Cd war I want you to touch me from the back of the neck to my lower arch Tiff liked what i did to her hair, and i will soon put more red in it. As for me i always like some purple, oh yeah.I am out, light a motha-fuc*ing-light. *click*

Something that i have known for awhile but thought that i would share. If you ever want to just stream i recommend the following... urlLink KCRW urlLink Radio Paradise urlLink Launch Cast Plus (80s alternative, is a fav.) Other Albums to look into: urlLink TRAVIS (12 memories) urlLink FINAL STRAW (How to be dead) urlLink WITH THE TIDES (Colours in Waves) urlLink WILCO (a Ghost is Born) NEED TEEEEEES? urlLink DJTEES urlLink EIGHBALL urlLink SHOCKER Kelley writes none, Eric calls none, Thomas talks some, and there is only me, only one. Ben you are badass and i love my postcard! Oh yeah, brownie points you now have. Sorry Blake, are you hating on me? Purple sheets, black eyes and velvet touches. you see me i see you and we do the run around. you call never, you say things that are quite clever and you be with me, prob. never. The aches and pains of my two job feet, and the smiles that lack in customers and hate that runs deep. The daily sighs of the world, the weight of 10 thousand ice cream swirls. The tone in your voice and the whisper of disease in your ear. A conversation in reading form, means more than you and your yesterdays score. The daily "damn can i get your number" to the silence that is crucial to everydays balance. I paint my face for you, and you sprinkle laugh a lot on the no go no show. I look for you around corners and laugh at myself when i think that i actually would breath you in for a day. Who needs wind in the trees when i dare to never go outside again. I run in my flip-flops with my shiny nail polish shimmering in the sun, you have already done the undone. You know what, fuck you in your yeah yeah yeah attitude, im better than you and im now in a better mood. Drive Thru Please.......... Cingular must come up with some better ringtones for us, eesh. Right now i have Bitter Sweet Symphony on my cell, but would love "london calling" "Dido". Isobel plays with a sock on the bed and Mika has a lowered head. Frankie will get his night time light on and a dose of meal worms. I will get a sigh as to why and the day will end and my eventfull dreams will begin. I need to paint again, yup i miss that. Housewarmig party this Saturday? 7:30 maybe. Had lunch with my sis and mom today. The waiter hit on me, quite cute and he was as well. Left empty handed by choice, like usual. Sis has a cheating hubby? Let me catch his ass. Speaking of catching someone, STEVEN still owes me my twenty bucks, guess what, im going to his job and im not nice this weekend, wanna join me? Its only been about 3 months for 20 bucks. Its not the money its the principal. The pictures of all the vehicles below happen to be cars that I am really into right now. Saturday I went from lot to lot with a camera, yeah I got some looks, but I got some pics too! All the of the vehicle (in case you didn't know) are highly badass machines. The S2000 is my fav. of course. Post and tell me your fav. right now! Friday night Tiff and I were bringing in the pallets of dog food. Tiff cant pull the pallets herself, so helped her get them in. On the first pallet we get it inside and she releases the lever on the pallet jack, right on my foot! (never yelling) I ask her to please get the pallet off my foot. I finally had to pull my foot out from underneath. Knowing that I still had a job to do I helped her bring in the other pallets. Walking out to my car, got in, and noticed that it happened to be my driving foot, shit. I sat there in the silence staring at a empty parking lot, eventually I just bucked it up and drove home. Jason thought I should go to the emergency room, after pulling off my shoe and seeing a nice blue color and blood. I have a high tolerance for pain, I just get pissed at pain cause it bothers me. Went to get Xrays and had good news that nothing was broke, he said that I was lucky. The pallet did smush my foot down to the bone. I went home after that and got some sleep, after all I needed to be at work at 8am in the morning. I did, I went to work for 6 hours the next day without a break and worked again today. I am too busy and don't wanna be a gimp, ha. Ended up the the pallet weighed pounds shy of 2000. Blake im sorry I did not call you and we didn't hook up..... Just got thru reading Kelly's e mail, he kicks ass. I love how he talks and cares enough to write long e-mails to me. (takes the time) brownie points for the Kelley! (quite tempting he is) Went to Barnes and spent too much money, but well worth it, take a peek!:::::: CD: urlLink Of Montreal (satanic panic in the attic) Was recommended and I dig! 1. urlLink Uncut (Magazine) (August Issue) $8.50 Featuring: Robert Smith Exclusive. Michael Moore,Voodoo Lounge FREE CD ATTACHED: Americana 2004 2. urlLink Filter (Magazine) (August Issue) $4.95 Featuring: Robert Smith (25 years of the Cure) , Digital Underground, The Polyphonic Spree, Wilco 3. urlLink Paste (Magazine) (August Issue) $5.95 Featuring: Wilco, The Polyphonic Spree, Damien Rice 90 cd and book reviews FREE CD INSIDE: Featuring a rare Coldplay track and 21 more artist.... 4. urlLink Independent Film Guide (Paperback) (Videohounds) Just awesome as hell, its a must.. not too bad- $21.95 Also, would like to introduce you to urlLink KEANE ....check them out, good stuff! Damn good reading...... This was what i got, Thanks for the Quiz Thomas... You are a goddess!

Holy Shit Last night was a night, I must admit. I was asked to be someone's wife. Oh yeah, I had a marriage proposal. This was not a drunk man in the corner bragging about my rack and how he would like to pull on my long hair. This was a guy that a year ago I was in a 3 year relationship with, a THREE year relationship. Ken and I went thru everything you could imagine and we had some tough times. I loved him then, and I still love him now. He said that now he had learned a few things since I had left, and he has grown quite a bit. He learned that he would have not done half the things he did, now. He told me that he knows in his heart that I am the only women that he wants to spend the rest of his life with. I am the only women that has made him happy. That he would be broke and living on the streets, it wouldn't matter if he had me. He would move anywhere I wanted and travel with me everywhere, as long as I was with him. He misses my hair all over, my dogs hair all over and my clothes all over the place. *he started to cry* I loved ken then and I love ken now, there has been no change in feelings towards him, I had just needed to get out at the time. Here is the twist, I am also in love with someone else. holy crap, fuck fuck fuck. I have never met anyone like this second one, god he is odd but very loavable, what do i do? They are diffrent from each other, so i have both sides to choose from, but damn if it does not make it harder. I am crazy. I was a little upset that Thomas and Robert didnt come, or call! But i guess i just have to start expecting that from people. I never get what i give out, its how life is, blah blah whatever. AM I WIFE MATERIAL?
